 270+ 0000              CopyPosToXX15Macro: MACRO   prefix1?
 271+ 0000 ~
 272+ 0000 ~            prefix1?_CopyPosToXX15:    ld hl,prefix1?_Bnkxhi
 273+ 0000 ~                                       ld de,prefix1?_BnkXScaled
 274+ 0000 ~                                       ldi
 275+ 0000 ~                                       ldi
 276+ 0000 ~                                       inc hl ; skip to y high
 277+ 0000 ~                                       ldi
 278+ 0000 ~                                       ldi
 279+ 0000 ~                                       inc hl ; skip to z hig
 280+ 0000 ~                                       ldi
 281+ 0000 ~                                       ldi
 282+ 0000 ~                                       ret
 283+ 0000                                  ENDM
 284+ 0000
 285+ 0000              CopyXX12ScaledToXX18Macro:  MACRO    prefix1?
 286+ 0000 ~            prefix1?_CopyXX12ScaledToXX18:
 287+ 0000 ~            prefix1?_CopyResultToDrawCam:    ld      hl, prefix1?_XX12
 288+ 0000 ~                                             ld      de, prefix1?_XX18
 289+ 0000 ~                                             ldi    ; X12+0 => XX18+0  Set XX18(2 0) = dot_sidev
 290+ 0000 ~                                             inc de ; skip to XX18+2 as it will be on XX18+1
 291+ 0000 ~                                             ldi    ; XX12+1 => XX18+2
 292+ 0000 ~                                             ldi    ; XX12+2 => XX18+3 Set XX12+1 => XX18+2
 293+ 0000 ~                                             inc de ; skip to XX18+5 as it will be on XX18+4
 294+ 0000 ~                                             ldi    ; XX12+3 => XX18+5
 295+ 0000 ~                                             ldi    ; XX12+4 => XX18+6 Set XX18(8 6) = dot_nosev
 296+ 0000 ~                                             inc de ; skip to XX18+8 as it will be on XX18+7
 297+ 0000 ~                                             ldi    ; XX12+5 => XX18+8
 298+ 0000 ~                                             ret
 299+ 0000                                          ENDM
 300+ 0000
 301+ 0000              CopyXX12toXX15Macro:        MACRO    prefix1?
 302+ 0000 ~            prefix1?_CopyXX12toXX15:         ld      hl, prefix1?_BnkXX12xLo
 303+ 0000 ~                                             ld      de, prefix1?_XX18
 304+ 0000 ~                                             ldi      ; xlo
 305+ 0000 ~                                             ldi      ; xsg
 306+ 0000 ~                                             ldi      ; xlo
 307+ 0000 ~                                             ldi      ; xsg
 308+ 0000 ~                                             ldi      ; xlo
 309+ 0000 ~                                             ldi      ; xsg
 310+ 0000 ~                                             ret
 311+ 0000                                          ENDM
 312+ 0000
 313+ 0000              InitialiseUniverseObjMacro: MACRO   prefix1?
 314+ 0000 ~            prefix1?_InitRotMat:    ld      hl, 0
 315+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatSidevY),hl       ; set the zeroes
 316+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatSidevZ),hl       ; set the zeroes
 317+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatRoofvX),hl       ; set the zeroes
 318+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatRoofvZ),hl       ; set the zeroes
 319+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatNosevX),hl       ; set the zeroes
 320+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatNosevY),hl       ; set the zeroes
 321+ 0000 ~            ; Optimised as already have 0 in l
 322+ 0000 ~                                    ld      h, $60	             				; 96 in hi byte
 323+ 0000 ~                                    ;ld      hl,1
 324+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatSidevX),hl
 325+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatRoofvY),hl
 326+ 0000 ~            ; Optimised as already have 0 in l
 327+ 0000 ~                                    ld      h, $E0					            ; -96 in hi byte which is +96 with hl bit 7 set
 328+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatNosevZ),hl
 329+ 0000 ~                                    ret
 330+ 0000                                          ENDM
 331+ 0000

   1+ 0000              ; limited to 255 character length
   2+ 0000              CountLengthHL:          MACRO   Limiter
   3+ 0000 ~                                    ld      de,hl
   4+ 0000 ~                                    ld      bc,Limiter
   5+ 0000 ~                                    xor     a
   6+ 0000 ~                                    cpir
   7+ 0000 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
   8+ 0000 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
   9+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,l
  10+ 0000 ~                                    ret
  11+ 0000                                      ENDM

  13+ 0000              IncMemMaxN:             MACRO   mem, maxvalue
  14+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(mem)
  15+ 0000 ~                                    cp      maxvalue
  16+ 0000 ~                                    jr      c,.IncMaxed
  17+ 0000 ~                                    inc     a
  18+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (mem),a
  19+ 0000 ~            .IncMaxed:
  20+ 0000                                      ENDM
  21+ 0000
  22+ 0000              IncMemMaxNCycle:        MACRO   mem, cyclevalue
  23+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(mem)
  24+ 0000 ~                                    inc     a
  25+ 0000 ~                                    cp      cyclevalue
  26+ 0000 ~                                    jr      c,.IncMaxed
  27+ 0000 ~                                    xor     a
  28+ 0000 ~            .IncMaxed:              ld      (mem),a
  29+ 0000                                      ENDM

  32+ 0000              HalfLengthHL:           MACRO
  33+ 0000 ~                                    ld      b,0
  34+ 0000 ~            .CountLenLoop:          ld      a,(hl)
  35+ 0000 ~                                    cp      0
  36+ 0000 ~                                    jr      z,.DoneCount
  37+ 0000 ~                                    inc     b
  38+ 0000 ~                                    inc     hl
  39+ 0000 ~                                    jr      .CountLenLoop
  40+ 0000 ~            .DoneCount:             ld      a,32
  41+ 0000 ~                                    sub     b
  42+ 0000 ~                                    sra     a
  43+ 0000                                      ENDM

 142+ 0000
 143+ 0000              ; Will check to see if bit 2 is set, if it is clear, then friendly hence z is set
 144+ 0000              ;                                    if hit is set then hostile hence z is not set
 145+ 0000              IsShipHostile:          MACRO
 146+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
 147+ 0000 ~                                    and     ShipIsHostile
 148+ 0000                                      ENDM
 149+ 0000
 150+ 0000              ; Will check to see if bit 2 is set, if it is clear, then friendly hence z is set
 151+ 0000              ;                                    if hit is set then hostile hence z is not set
 152+ 0000              IsShipFriendly:         MACRO
 153+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
 154+ 0000 ~                                    and     ShipNotHostile                  ; mask so we only have hostile bit
 155+ 0000                                      ENDM
 156+ 0000
 157+ 0000              ; Will check to see if bit 5 is set, if clear, then not exploding z clear
 158+ 0000              ;                                    if set    then exploding     z set
 159+ 0000              IsShipExploding:        MACRO
 160+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
 161+ 0000 ~                                    and     ShipExploding
 162+ 0000                                      ENDM
 163+ 0000

 165+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(CurrLaserPulseOnCount)

 167+ 0000 ~                                    jr      z,.LaserOnIsDone

 172+ 0000 ~            .LaserOnIsDone:

 183+ 0000 ~            .LaserOffIsDone:
 184+ 0000                                      ENDM
 185+ 0000
 186+ 0000              UpdateLaserRestCounter: MACRO
 187+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(CurrLaserPulseRestCount)

 195+ 0000 ~            .LaserRestIsDone

 287+ 0000              DrainSystem:            MACRO   SystemMem, DrainMem
 288+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(DrainMem)
 289+ 0000 ~                                    ld      b,a
 290+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(SystemMem)
 291+ 0000 ~                                    sub     a,b
 292+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (SystemMem),a
 293+ 0000 ~                                    jr      c,.ZeroSystem
 294+ 0000 ~                                    jp      .ExitPoint
 295+ 0000 ~            .ZeroSystem:            ZeroA
 296+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (SystemMem),a
 297+ 0000 ~            .ExitPoint
 298+ 0000                                      ENDM
 299+ 0000
 300+ 0000              BoostSystem:            MACRO   SystemMem, BoostMem
 301+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(BoostMem)
 302+ 0000 ~                                    ld      b,a
 303+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(SystemMem)
 304+ 0000 ~                                    add     b
 305+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (SystemMem),a
 306+ 0000 ~                                    jr      c, .MaxSystem
 307+ 0000 ~                                    jp      .ExitPoint
 308+ 0000 ~            .MaxSystem:             ld      a,255
 309+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (SystemMem),a
 310+ 0000 ~            .ExitPoint
 311+ 0000                                      ENDM

 313+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER HasEngineSoundChanged:  MACRO
 314+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         ld      a,(EngineSoundChanged)
 315+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         and     a
 316+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         ENDM
 317+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER
 318+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER ClearEngineSoundChanged:MACRO
 319+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         xor      a
 320+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         ld      (EngineSoundChanged),a
 321+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         ENDM
 322+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER
 323+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER SetEngineSoundChanged:  MACRO
 324+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         ld      a,$FF
 325+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         ld      (EngineSoundChanged),a
 326+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         ENDM

  42  0000                                      INCLUDE "../../Variables/UniverseSlot_macros.asm"
# file opened: ../../Variables/UniverseSlot_macros.asm
   1+ 0000
   2+ 0000              AddJunkCount:           MACRO
   3+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,JunkCount
   4+ 0000 ~                                    inc     (hl)
   5+ 0000                                      ENDM
   6+ 0000
   7+ 0000              SubJunkCount:           MACRO
   8+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,JunkCount
   9+ 0000 ~                                    dec     (hl)
  10+ 0000                                      ENDM
  11+ 0000
  12+ 0000              ClearJunkCount:         MACRO
  13+ 0000 ~                                    ZeroA
  14+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (JunkCount),a
  15+ 0000                                      ENDM
  16+ 0000
  17+ 0000              AddCop:                 MACRO
  18+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,CopCount
  19+ 0000 ~                                    inc     (hl)
  20+ 0000                                      ENDM
  21+ 0000
  22+ 0000              SubCop:                 MACRO
  23+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,CopCount
  24+ 0000 ~                                    dec     (hl)
  25+ 0000                                      ENDM
  26+ 0000
  27+ 0000              AddPirateCount:         MACRO
  28+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,PirateCount
  29+ 0000 ~                                    inc     (hl)
  30+ 0000                                      ENDM
  31+ 0000
  32+ 0000              SubPirateCount:         MACRO
  33+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,PirateCount
  34+ 0000 ~                                    inc     (hl)
  35+ 0000                                      ENDM
  36+ 0000
  37+ 0000              AreCopsPresent:         MACRO
  38+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(CopCount)
  39+ 0000 ~                                    and     a
  40+ 0000                                      ENDM
  41+ 0000
  42+ 0000              ; Class == shiptype
  43+ 0000              SetSlotAToUnivClass:    MACRO
  44+ 0000 ~                                    ex      af,af'
  45+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
  46+ 0000 ~                                    ld      b,a
  47+ 0000 ~                                    ex      af,af'
  48+ 0000 ~                                    call    SetSlotAToClassB
  49+ 0000                                      ENDM
  50+ 0000
  51+ 0000              TestRoomForJunk:        MACRO   Target
  52+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,3
  53+ 0000 ~                                    JumpIfMemTrue  SpaceStationSafeZone, .DoTest
  54+ 0000 ~                                    add     a,2
  55+ 0000 ~            .DoTest                 JumpIfALTMemusng    JunkCount, Target
  56+ 0000                                      ENDM
  57+ 0000
  58+ 0000              JumpIfSpaceStation:     MACRO   Target
  59+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,UniverseSlotType
  60+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
  61+ 0000 ~                                    cp      ShipTypeStation
  62+ 0000                                      ENDM
  63+ 0000
  64+ 0000              ClearSlotMem:           MACRO   mem
  65+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(mem)
  66+ 0000 ~                                    call    ClearSlotA
  67+ 0000                                      ENDM
  68+ 0000
  69+ 0000              IsSlotEmpty:            MACRO
  70+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  71+ 0000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  72+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
  73+ 0000 ~                                    cp      0
  74+ 0000                                      ENDM
  75+ 0000
  76+ 0000              IsSlotMissile:          MACRO
  77+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,UniverseSlotType
  78+ 0000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  79+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
  80+ 0000 ~                                    cp      ShipTypeMissile
  81+ 0000                                      ENDM
  82+ 0000
  83+ 0000
  84+ 0000              ; Checks if slot is empty else A = ship type
  85+ 0000              ReturnIfSlotAEmpty:     MACRO
  86+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  87+ 0000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  88+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
  89+ 0000 ~                                    inc     a
  90+ 0000 ~                                    ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
  91+ 0000 ~                                    dec     a           ; get original value back for later
  92+ 0000                                      ENDM
  93+ 0000
  94+ 0000              JumpIfSlotAEmpty:       MACRO   Target
  95+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  96+ 0000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  97+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
  98+ 0000 ~                                    inc     a
  99+ 0000 ~                                    jp      z,Target    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 100+ 0000 ~                                    dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 101+ 0000                                      ENDM
 102+ 0000
 103+ 0000              JumpIfSlotHLEmpty:      MACRO   Target
 104+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 105+ 0000 ~                                    and     a
 106+ 0000 ~                                    jr      nz,Target
 107+ 0000                                      ENDM
# file closed: ../../Variables/UniverseSlot_macros.asm

 274  6024 3E 14                                ld      a,20
 275  6026 32 80 66                             ld      (JSTY),a
 276  6029 CD 7C 60                             call    draw_front_calc_beta
 277  602C C9                                   ret
 278  602D
 279  602D              PressedPitchMinus:      MMUSelectUniverseN 0
 279  602D ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0
 280  6031 3E EC                                ld      a,-20
 281  6033 32 80 66                             ld      (JSTY),a
 282  6036 CD 7C 60                             call    draw_front_calc_beta
 283  6039 C9                                   ret
 284  603A
 285  603A              PressedRollPlus:        MMUSelectUniverseN 0
 285  603A ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0
 286  603E 3E 14                                ld      a,20
 287  6040 32 8A 66                             ld      (JSTX),a
 288  6043 CD 54 60                             call    draw_front_calc_alpha
 289  6046 C9                                   ret
 290  6047
 291  6047              PressedRollMinus:       MMUSelectUniverseN 0
 291  6047 ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0
 292  604B 3E EC                                ld      a,-20
 293  604D 32 8A 66                             ld      (JSTX),a
 294  6050 CD 54 60                             call    draw_front_calc_alpha
 295  6053 C9                                   ret
 296  6054
 297  6054 47           draw_front_calc_alpha:  ld      b,a
 298  6055 E6 80                                and     $80
 299  6057 32 8E 66                             ld      (ALP2),a                            ; set sign
 300  605A 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; save sign
 301  605B EE 80                                xor     $80
 302  605D 32 8F 66                             ld      (ALP2FLIP),a                        ; and oppsite sign
 303  6060 3A 8A 66                             ld      a,(JSTX)
 304  6063 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 305  6066 28 02                                jr      z,  .PositiveRoll
 306  6068 ED 44        .NegativeRoll:          neg
 307  606A CB 3F        .PositiveRoll           srl     a                                   ; divide sign by 4
 308  606C CB 3F                                srl     a
 309  606E FE 08                                cp      8
 310  6070 38 02                                jr      c,.NotIncreasedDamp                 ; if a < 8 divide by 2 again
 311  6072 CB 3F        .IncreasedDamp          srl     a
 312  6074 32 8D 66     .NotIncreasedDamp:      ld      (ALP1),a
 313  6077 B1                                   or      c
 314  6078 32 8C 66                             ld      (ALPHA),a                           ; a = signed bit alph1
 315  607B C9                                   ret
 316  607C
 317  607C              ; Do the same for pitch
 318  607C 47           draw_front_calc_beta:   ld      b,a
 319  607D E6 80                                and     $80
 320  607F 32 82 66                             ld      (BET2),a                            ; set sign
 321  6082 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; save sign
 322  6083 EE 80                                xor     $80
 323  6085 32 83 66                             ld      (BET2FLIP),a                        ; and oppsite sign
 324  6088 3A 80 66                             ld      a,(JSTY)
 325  608B ED 27 80                             test    $80
 326  608E 28 02                                jr      z,  .PositivePitch
 327  6090 ED 44        .NegativePitch:         neg
 328  6092 CB 3F        .PositivePitch:         srl     a                                   ; divide sign by 4
 329  6094 CB 3F                                srl     a
 330  6096 FE 08                                cp      8
 331  6098 38 02                                jr      c,.NotIncreasedDamp                 ; if a < 8 divide by 2 again
 332  609A CB 3F        .IncreasedDamp          srl     a
 333  609C 32 81 66     .NotIncreasedDamp:      ld      (BET1),a
 334  609F B1                                   or      c
 335  60A0 32 7F 66                             ld      (BETA),a                            ; a = signed bit bet1
 336  60A3 C9                                   ret
 337  60A4
 338  60A4              ;..Update Universe Objects.........................................................................................................
 339  60A4              ;..................................................................................................................................
 340  60A4              ;                           DEFINE ROTATIONDEBUG 1
 341  60A4              ;                           DEFINE CLIPDEBUG 1
 342  60A4 00           CurrentShipUniv:        DB      0
 343  60A5              ;..................................................................................................................................
 344  60A5              ; if ship is destroyed or exploding then z flag is clear, else z flag is set
 345  60A5              ;..................................................................................................................................
 346  60A5              ; Replacement for MVEIT routine
 347  60A5 AF           UpdateUniverseObjects:  xor     a

 350  60AC AF                                   xor     a
 351  60AD                                      MMUSelectUniverseA                                      ; and we apply roll and pitch
 351  60AD C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
 351  60AF ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 352  60B2 CD 3A D5     .ProperUpdate:          call    ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit                             ; todo , make all 4 of these 1 call

 354  60B8 FE 00                                cp      0

 356  60BD CD 3C D7                             call    ApplyShipSpeed
 357  60C0 CD 78 C6                             call    UpdateSpeedAndPitch                             ; update based on rates of speed roll and pitch accelleration/decelleration
 358  60C3 3E 00        .TotalDampen:           ld      a,0
 359  60C5 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; no pitch
 360  60C8 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 361  60CB 32 8A 66                             ld      (JSTX),a
 362  60CE 32 80 66                             ld      (JSTY),a
 363  60D1 CD 54 60                             call    draw_front_calc_alpha
 364  60D4 CD 7C 60                             call    draw_front_calc_beta
 365  60D7 C9                                   ret

 458  61AA                          include "../../Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
   1+ 61AA              ; We enter here with hl pointing at XX16 and bc = XX15 value
   2+ 61AA              ; so xx12 = XX15 * XX16 row
   3+ 61AA              XX12ProcessOneRow:
   4+ 61AA              XX12CalcXCell:
   5+ 61AA ED 4B A6 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkXScaled)
   6+ 61AE 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
   7+ 61AF 23           		inc		hl
   8+ 61B0 56           		ld		d,(hl)                                  ; so now e = xx16 value d = xx16 sign
   9+ 61B1 7A           		ld		a,d
  10+ 61B2 A8                   xor     b
  11+ 61B3 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit                            ; a = XX 16 sign
  12+ 61B5 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  13+ 61B7 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  14+ 61B8 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  15+ 61BA 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  16+ 61BB E5           		push	hl
  17+ 61BC 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  18+ 61BE 60           		ld		h,b
  19+ 61BF 69           		ld		l,c
  20+ 61C0 CD 84 6C     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  21+ 61C3 22 45 66     		ld		(XX12PVarResult1),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result, we only want to use high byte later
  22+ 61C6 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  23+ 61C8 32 4C 66     		ld		(XX12PVarSign1),a					    ; S = sign  not sign 1 and 2 are reversed in memory so that fetchign back will put 1 in high byte 2 in low byte
  24+ 61CB E1           		pop		hl
  25+ 61CC              XX12CalcYCell:
  26+ 61CC ED 4B A8 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkYScaled)
  27+ 61D0 23           		inc		hl
  28+ 61D1 5E           		ld		e,(hl)							    	; get orientation ZX
  29+ 61D2 23           		inc		hl
  30+ 61D3 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  31+ 61D4 7A           		ld		a,d
  32+ 61D5 A8                   xor     b
  33+ 61D6 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  34+ 61D8 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; XX16 orientation sign to ixh
  35+ 61DA 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  36+ 61DB E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  37+ 61DD 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  38+ 61DE E5           		push	hl
  39+ 61DF 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  40+ 61E1 60           		ld		h,b
  41+ 61E2 69           		ld		l,c
  42+ 61E3 CD 84 6C     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  43+ 61E6 22 47 66     		ld		(XX12PVarResult2),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  44+ 61E9 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  45+ 61EB 32 4B 66     		ld		(XX12PVarSign2),a					    ; S = sign
  46+ 61EE E1           		pop		hl
  47+ 61EF              XX12CalcZCell:
  48+ 61EF ED 4B AA C0          ld		bc,(UBnkZScaled)
  49+ 61F3 23           		inc		hl
  50+ 61F4 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
  51+ 61F5 23           		inc		hl
  52+ 61F6 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  53+ 61F7 7A           		ld		a,d
  54+ 61F8 A8                   xor     b
  55+ 61F9 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 61FB DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  57+ 61FD 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  58+ 61FE E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  59+ 6200 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  60+ 6201 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  61+ 6203 60           		ld		h,b
  62+ 6204 69           		ld		l,c
  63+ 6205 CD 84 6C     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  64+ 6208 22 49 66     		ld		(XX12PVarResult3),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  65+ 620B DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  66+ 620D 32 4D 66     		ld		(XX12PVarSign3),a					    ; S = sign
  67+ 6210              XX12CalcCellResult:
  68+ 6210 2A 45 66     		ld		hl,(XX12PVarResult1)				    ; X Cell Result
  69+ 6213 ED 5B 47 66  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult2)				    ; Y Cell Result
  70+ 6217 ED 4B 4B 66  		ld		bc,(XX12PVarSign2)					    ; b = var 1 result sign c = var 2 result signs
  71+ 621B              XX12MSBOnly:
  72+ 621B 6C           		ld		l,h									    ; now move results into lower byte so / 256
  73+ 621C 5A           		ld		e,d									    ; for both results
  74+ 621D AF           		xor		a									    ;
  75+ 621E 67           		ld		h,a									    ;
  76+ 621F 57           		ld		d,a									    ; so set high byte to 0
  77+ 6220 CD 33 00     		call	ADDHLDESignBC                           ;  XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result1 + result 2 signed in a
  78+ 6223 47           		ld		b,a									    ; move sign into b ready for next calc
  79+ 6224 3A 4D 66     		ld		a,(XX12PVarSign3)					    ; result of the calcZ cell
  80+ 6227 4F           		ld		c,a									    ; goes into c to align with DE
  81+ 6228 ED 5B 49 66  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult3)				    ; now add result to Result 3
  82+ 622C 5A           		ld		e,d                                     ; d = result /256
  83+ 622D 16 00        		ld		d,0									    ; and only us high byte
  84+ 622F CD 33 00     		call	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result and a = sign
  85+ 6232 C9           		ret											    ; hl = result, a = sign
  86+ 6233              								    ; hl = result, a = sign
  87+ 6233
  88+ 6233              XX12EquNodeDotTransMat:							    ; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
  89+ 6233              ;...X cell
  90+ 6233 21 79 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
  91+ 6236 CD AA 61             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
  92+ 6239 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
  93+ 623A 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
  94+ 623B B0           		or		b
  95+ 623C 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
  96+ 623F 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
  97+ 6240 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
  98+ 6243              ;...Y cell
  99+ 6243 21 81 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 100+ 6246 CD AA 61             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 101+ 6249 47           		ld		b,a
 102+ 624A 7C           		ld		a,h
 103+ 624B              ;		ld		a,l
 104+ 624B B0           		or		b
 105+ 624C 32 AF C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 106+ 624F 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 107+ 6250 32 AE C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 108+ 6253              ;...Z cell
 109+ 6253 21 89 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 110+ 6256 CD AA 61             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 111+ 6259 47           		ld		b,a
 112+ 625A 7C                   ld		a,h
 113+ 625B              ;		ld		a,l
 114+ 625B B0           		or		b
 115+ 625C 32 B1 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 116+ 625F 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 117+ 6260 32 B0 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 118+ 6263 C9                   ret

 123+ 6267 CD AA 61             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 124+ 626A 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 125+ 626B 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 126+ 626C B0           		or		b
 127+ 626D 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 128+ 6270 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 129+ 6271 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 130+ 6274              ;...Y cell
 131+ 6274 21 81 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1

 133+ 627A 47           		ld		b,a
 134+ 627B 7C           		ld		a,h
 135+ 627C              ;		ld		a,l
 136+ 627C B0           		or		b
 137+ 627D 32 AF C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7

 152+ 6295              XX12EquNodeDotXX16:					         		; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 153+ 6295              ;...X cell
 154+ 6295 21 61 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 155+ 6298 CD AA 61             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 156+ 629B 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 157+ 629C 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 158+ 629D B0           		or		b
 159+ 629E 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 160+ 62A1 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 161+ 62A2 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 162+ 62A5              ;...Y cell
 163+ 62A5 21 67 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX     			; process orientation matrix row 1

 180+ 62C1 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now

 460  6302                          include "../../Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 6302              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 6302                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
   3+ 6302 ~                                    ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   4+ 6302 ~                                    ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 6302 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
   6+ 6302 ~            .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		e,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value              ;
   7+ 6302 ~                                    inc		hl                  ;
   8+ 6302 ~                                    ld		a,(hl)              ;
   9+ 6302 ~                                    ld		d,a                 ;
  10+ 6302 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  11+ 6302 ~                                    ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  12+ 6302 ~                                    ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 6302 ~                                    ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  14+ 6302 ~                                    push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  15+ 6302 ~                                    push	hl                  ; save HL
  16+ 6302 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256Div197Log;
  17+ 6302 ~                                    pop		hl
  18+ 6302 ~                                    dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  19+ 6302 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  20+ 6302 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  21+ 6302 ~                                    ld      a,ixl
  22+ 6302 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  23+ 6302 ~                                    pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  24+ 6302 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  25+ 6302 ~                                    djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  26+ 6302 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
  27+ 6302 ~                                    ret
  28+ 6302                      ELSE
  29+ 6302 06 09                                ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
  30+ 6304 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
  31+ 6306 21 61 C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
  32+ 6309 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
  33+ 630A 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
  34+ 630B 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
  35+ 630C 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
  36+ 630D 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
  37+ 630E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  38+ 6310 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  39+ 6312                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  39+ 6312 CB 23       >			   sla e
  39+ 6314 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  40+ 6316 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  41+ 6317 C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  42+ 6318 E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  43+ 6319 CD 04 71                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  44+ 631C E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ 631D 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  46+ 631E 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  47+ 631F 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  48+ 6320                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  49+ 6320                                  ;    and     $80
  50+ 6320 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  51+ 6322 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  52+ 6323 C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  53+ 6324 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  54+ 6325 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  55+ 6327 C9                                   ret
  56+ 6328                      ENDIF
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm

 462  6328                          include "../../Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ../../Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 6328              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 6328              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 6328              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 6328              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 6328
   6+ 6328              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 6328              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 6328
   9+ 6328 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 6329 CD 4A 6B                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 632C EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 632D F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 632F 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 6330 E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 6332 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 6333 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 6334 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 6335 CD 4A 6B                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 6338 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 6339 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 633A E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 633C B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 633D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 633E 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 633F EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 6340 CD 4A 6B                             call    doRND
  27+ 6343 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 6344 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 6346 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 6347 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 6348 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 634A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 634B EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 634C CD 4A 6B                             call    doRND
  35+ 634F EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 6350 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 6351 E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 6353 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 6354 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 6355 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 6356 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 6357 CD 4A 6B                             call    doRND
  43+ 635A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 635B F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 635D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 635E 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 635F F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 6361 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 6363 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 6364 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 6365 C9                                   ret
  52+ 6366
  53+ 6366 EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 6367 CD 4A 6B                             call    doRND
  55+ 636A CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 636C CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 636E EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 636F E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 6371 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 6372 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 6374 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 6375 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 6376 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 6377 CD 4A 6B                             call    doRND
  65+ 637A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 637B 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 637C E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 637E B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 637F 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 6380 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 6381 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 6382 CD 4A 6B                             call    doRND
  73+ 6385 CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 6387 CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 6389 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 638A E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 638C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 638D 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 638E E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 6390 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 6391 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 6392 CD 4A 6B                             call    doRND
  83+ 6395 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 6396 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 6397 E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 6399 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 639A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 639B 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 639C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 639D CD 4A 6B                             call    doRND
  91+ 63A0 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 63A1 F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 63A3 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 63A4 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 63A5 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 63A7 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 63A9 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 63AA 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 63AB C9                                   ret
 100+ 63AC
 101+ 63AC              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 102+ 63AC 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 103+ 63AE 21 99 68                             ld      hl,varDust
 104+ 63B1 CD 28 63     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 105+ 63B4 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 106+ 63B6 C9                                   ret
 107+ 63B7              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 108+ 63B7 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 109+ 63B9 21 99 68                             ld      hl,varDust
 110+ 63BC CD 66 63     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 111+ 63BF 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 112+ 63C1 C9                                   ret
 113+ 63C2              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 114+ 63C2 FD 21 99 68  SaveCurrentDust:        ld          iy,varDust
 115+ 63C6 DD 21 83 68                          ld          ix,varDustWarpRender
 116+ 63CA 06 0B                                ld          b, MaxNumberOfStars
 117+ 63CC FD 7E 01     .SaveLoop               ld          a,(iy+1)
 118+ 63CF 6F                                   ld          l,a
 119+ 63D0 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 120+ 63D2                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegXPt
 120+ 63D2 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 120+ 63D4 C2 DD 63    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegXPt
 121+ 63D7 C6 80                                add         a,$80
 122+ 63D9 5F                                   ld          e,a
 123+ 63DA C3 E2 63                             jp          .StarDoneX
 124+ 63DD 57           .StarNegXPt:            ld          d,a
 125+ 63DE 3E 80                                ld          a,$80
 126+ 63E0 92                                   sub         d
 127+ 63E1 5F                                   ld          e,a
 128+ 63E2 FD 7E 03     .StarDoneX:             ld          a,(iy+3)
 129+ 63E5 6F                                   ld          l,a
 130+ 63E6 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 131+ 63E8                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegYPt
 131+ 63E8 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 131+ 63EA C2 F3 63    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegYPt
 132+ 63ED C6 60                                add         a,$60
 133+ 63EF 57                                   ld          d,a
 134+ 63F0 C3 F8 63                             jp          .StarDoneY
 135+ 63F3 57           .StarNegYPt:            ld          d,a
 136+ 63F4 3E 60                                ld          a,$60
 137+ 63F6 92                                   sub         d
 138+ 63F7 57                                   ld          d,a
 139+ 63F8 DD 73 00     .StarDoneY:             ld          (ix+0),e
 140+ 63FB DD 72 01                             ld          (ix+1),d
 141+ 63FE DD 23                                inc         ix
 142+ 6400 DD 23                                inc         ix
 143+ 6402 FD E5 E1                             ld          hl,iy
 144+ 6405 3E 06                                ld          a,6
 145+ 6407 ED 31                                add         hl,a
 146+ 6409 E5 FD E1                             ld          iy,hl
 147+ 640C 10 BE                                djnz        .SaveLoop
 148+ 640E C9                                   ret
 149+ 640F
 150+ 640F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 151+ 640F 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 152+ 6411 FD 21 99 68                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 153+ 6415 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 154+ 6416 FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 155+ 6419 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 156+ 641A 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 157+ 641C 3A 6D 67                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 158+ 641F                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 158+ 641F A7          >                        and     a
 158+ 6420 C2 24 64    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 159+ 6423 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 160+ 6424 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 161+ 6425 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 162+ 6427 CD 90 71                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 163+ 642A                                      ShiftHLRight1
 163+ 642A CB 3C       >			   srl h
 163+ 642C CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 164+ 642E                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 164+ 642E CB 3C       >			   srl h
 164+ 6430 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 165+ 6432 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 166+ 6433 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 167+ 6435 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 168+ 6437 FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 168+ 643B 66 05
 169+ 643D ED 5B 6E 67                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 170+ 6441 CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15
 171+ 6444                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 171+ 6444 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 171+ 6446 C2 9B 65    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 172+ 6449 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 172+ 644D 74 05
 173+ 644F FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 173+ 6453 66 01
 174+ 6455 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 175+ 6456 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 176+ 6458 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 177+ 6459 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 178+ 645B ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 179+ 645D 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 180+ 645E E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 181+ 6460 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 182+ 6461 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 183+ 6462 CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 184+ 6465 7C                                   ld      a,h
 185+ 6466 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 186+ 6468                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 186+ 6468 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 186+ 646A D2 9B 65    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 187+ 646D FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 187+ 6471 74 01
 188+ 6473 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 188+ 6477 66 03
 189+ 6479 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 190+ 647A E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 191+ 647C 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 192+ 647D DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 193+ 647F ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 194+ 6481 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 195+ 6482 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 196+ 6484 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 197+ 6485 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 198+ 6486 CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 199+ 6489 7C                                   ld      a,h
 200+ 648A E6 7F                                and     $7F
 201+ 648C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 201+ 648C FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 201+ 648E D2 9B 65    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 202+ 6491 7C                                   ld      a,h
 203+ 6492 E6 80                                and     $80
 204+ 6494 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 205+ 6496 7C                                   ld      a,h
 206+ 6497                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 206+ 6497 FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 206+ 6499 D2 9B 65    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 207+ 649C FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 207+ 64A0 74 03
 208+ 64A2              ; Now roll
 209+ 64A2              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 210+ 64A2 3A 8D 66     .XRoll:                 ld      a,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 211+ 64A5 FE 00                                cp      0
 212+ 64A7 28 4D                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 213+ 64A9                                   ;   break
 214+ 64A9 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ; roll magnitude
 215+ 64AA 3A 8F 66                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                        ; inverted roll sign
 216+ 64AD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; sanitise sign bit
 217+ 64AF 67                                   ld      h,a                                 ; h = roll sign
 218+ 64B0 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save on the stack
 219+ 64B1 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 220+ 64B2 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 221+ 64B3 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 222+ 64B6 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save signed byte
 223+ 64B7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; a = sign only
 224+ 64B9 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 225+ 64BA 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e                                 ; e = abs byte
 226+ 64BB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 227+ 64BD 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 228+ 64BE ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 229+ 64C0 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back sign from roll
 230+ 64C1 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 231+ 64C2 B2                                   or      d
 232+ 64C3 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 233+ 64C4 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 233+ 64C8 66 01
 234+ 64CA CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15                       ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 235+ 64CD FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 235+ 64D1 74 01
 236+ 64D3              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 237+ 64D3              .YRoll:                 ;break
 238+ 64D3 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 239+ 64D4 4C           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,h                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 240+ 64D5 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 241+ 64D6 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 242+ 64D9 5F                                   ld      e,a
 243+ 64DA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 244+ 64DC 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 245+ 64DD 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 246+ 64DE E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 247+ 64E0 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 248+ 64E1 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 249+ 64E3 79                                   ld      a,c
 250+ 64E4 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 251+ 64E5 B2                                   or      d
 252+ 64E6 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 253+ 64E7 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 253+ 64EB 66 03
 254+ 64ED CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 255+ 64F0 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 255+ 64F4 74 03
 256+ 64F6 3A 81 66     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 257+ 64F9 FE 00                                cp      0
 258+ 64FB 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 259+ 64FD              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 260+ 64FD 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 261+ 64FE FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 262+ 6501 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 263+ 6502 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 264+ 6504 5F                                   ld      e,a
 265+ 6505 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 266+ 6507                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 266+ 6507 CB 23       >			   sla e
 266+ 6509 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 267+ 650B 3A 82 66                             ld      a,(BET2)                            ; get inverted Sign
 268+ 650E B2                                   or      d
 269+ 650F 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 270+ 6510 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 270+ 6514 66 03
 271+ 6516 CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4
 272+ 6519 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 272+ 651D 74 03
 273+ 651F              ; now work out screen pos
 274+ 651F              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 275+ 651F              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 276+ 651F              ;        pop     de
 277+ 651F               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 278+ 651F                                      ;pop     de
 279+ 651F              .NoPitch:
 280+ 651F FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 281+ 6522 6F                                   ld      l,a
 282+ 6523 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 6525                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 283+ 6525 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 283+ 6527 C2 30 65    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 284+ 652A C6 80                                add     a,$80
 285+ 652C 4F                                   ld      c,a
 286+ 652D C3 35 65                             jp      StarDoneX
 287+ 6530 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 288+ 6531 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 289+ 6533 90                                   sub     b
 290+ 6534 4F                                   ld      c,a
 291+ 6535 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 292+ 6538 6F                                   ld      l,a
 293+ 6539 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 294+ 653B                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 294+ 653B CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 294+ 653D C2 46 65    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 295+ 6540 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 296+ 6542 47                                   ld      b,a
 297+ 6543 C3 4B 65                             jp      StarDoneY
 298+ 6546 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 299+ 6547 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 300+ 6549 90                                   sub     b
 301+ 654A 47                                   ld      b,a
 302+ 654B 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 303+ 654D C5                                   push    bc
 304+ 654E              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 304+ 654E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 305+ 6552 CD 8E E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 306+ 6555 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 307+ 6558 C1                                   pop    bc
 308+ 6559                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 308+ 6559 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 308+ 655B D2 8B 65    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 309+ 655E 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 310+ 6560 0C                                   inc     c
 311+ 6561 C5                                   push    bc
 312+ 6562                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 312+ 6562 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 313+ 6566 CD 8E E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 314+ 6569 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 315+ 656C C1                                   pop    bc
 316+ 656D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 316+ 656D FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 316+ 656F D2 8B 65    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 317+ 6572 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 318+ 6574 04                                   inc     b
 319+ 6575 C5                                   push    bc
 320+ 6576                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 320+ 6576 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 321+ 657A CD 8E E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 322+ 657D FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 323+ 6580 C1                                   pop    bc
 324+ 6581 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 325+ 6583 0D                                   dec     c
 326+ 6584                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 326+ 6584 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 327+ 6588 CD 8E E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 328+ 658B C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 329+ 658C FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 330+ 658E E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 331+ 658F ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 332+ 6593 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 333+ 6594 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 334+ 6596 05                                   dec     b
 335+ 6597 C2 15 64                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 336+ 659A C9                                   ret
 337+ 659B C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 338+ 659C FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 339+ 659E E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 340+ 659F CD 28 63                             call    InitStarAtHL
 341+ 65A2 C3 8C 65                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 342+ 65A5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 343+ 65A5 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 344+ 65A8 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 345+ 65AB 6F                                   ld      l,a
 346+ 65AC E6 7F                                and     $7F
 347+ 65AE 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 65AF CD 1B 71                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 349+ 65B2 7D                                   ld      a,l
 350+ 65B3                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 350+ 65B3 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 350+ 65B5 C2 C0 65    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 351+ 65B8              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 352+ 65B8 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 353+ 65BA 26 00                                ld          h,0
 354+ 65BC 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 355+ 65BD C3 C7 65                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 356+ 65C0              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 357+ 65C0 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 358+ 65C2 26 00                                ld          h,0
 359+ 65C4                                      ClearCarryFlag
 359+ 65C4 B7          >                        or a
 360+ 65C5 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 361+ 65C7              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 362+ 65C7 7D                                   ld          a,l
 363+ 65C8 32 F1 68                             ld          (varStarX),a
 364+ 65CB C9                                   ret
 365+ 65CC
 366+ 65CC FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 367+ 65CF FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 368+ 65D2 6F                                   ld          l,a
 369+ 65D3 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 370+ 65D5 47                                   ld          b,a
 371+ 65D6 CD 1B 71                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 372+ 65D9 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 373+ 65DA                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 373+ 65DA CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 373+ 65DC C2 E7 65    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 374+ 65DF                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 375+ 65DF 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 376+ 65E1                                      ClearCarryFlag
 376+ 65E1 B7          >                        or a
 377+ 65E2 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 378+ 65E4 C3 EC 65                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 379+ 65E7              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 380+ 65E7 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 381+ 65E9 26 00                                ld          h,0
 382+ 65EB 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 383+ 65EC              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 384+ 65EC 7D                                   ld          a,l
 385+ 65ED 32 F2 68                             ld          (varStarY),a
 386+ 65F0 C9                                   ret
 387+ 65F1
 388+ 65F1
# file closed: ../../Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
 463  65F1
 464  65F1                          INCLUDE	"../../Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ../../Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 65F1
   2+ 65F1 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 65F2 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 65F6 7D
   4+ 65F7 F1 65        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 65F9 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 65FB 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 65FE 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 6600 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 6604              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 6604
  11+ 6604              memfill_dma:
  12+ 6604              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 6604              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 6604 32 F1 65     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 6607              .set_target:
  16+ 6607 22 FE 65     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 660A              .set_length:
  18+ 660A ED 53 F9 65  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 660E              .write_dma:
  20+ 660E 21 F2 65     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 6611 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 6613 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 6615 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 6617 C9           	ret
  25+ 6618
# file closed: ../../Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 465  6618                          INCLUDE	"../../Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ../../Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 6618
   2+ 6618 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 661C 7D
   3+ 661D 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 661F 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 6621 14 10 CD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_BURST_MODE;DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 6624 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 6626 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 662A              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 662A
  10+ 662A              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 662A              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 662A              .set_target:
  13+ 662A 22 24 66     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 662D              .set_source:
  15+ 662D ED 53 1D 66  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 6631              .set_length:
  17+ 6631 ED 43 1F 66  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 6635              .write_dma:
  19+ 6635 21 18 66     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 6638 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 663A 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 663C ED B3        	otir
  23+ 663E C9           	ret
  24+ 663F

 203+ 664E              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen
 204+ 664E              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  2 is #SST  Space Station, Coriolis or Dodo.

 217+ 664E              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 15 is #WRM  Worm with Anaconda
 218+ 664E              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 16 is #COP  Viper

 380+ 696E              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 381+ 696E              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 382+ 696E              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9

# file opened: ../../Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 6B49              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 6B49              doRND2:
   3+ 6B49 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 6B4A              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 6B4A              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 6B4A              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ 6B4A              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 6B4A 3A 68 66                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 6B4D CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 6B4F 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 6B50 21 6A 66     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 6B53 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 6B54 32 68 66     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 6B57 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 6B58 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 6B59 32 6A 66                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 6B5C 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 6B5D 3A 69 66                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 6B60 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 6B61 21 6B 66     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 6B64 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 6B65 32 69 66                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 6B68 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 6B69 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 6B6A 32 6B 66                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 6B6D 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 6B6E                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 6B6E C9                                   ret
  29+ 6B6F

  34+ 6B7A ED A0                                ldi
  35+ 6B7C ED A0                                ldi

  46+ 6B92 C9                                   ret

   6+ 6B9E 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 6B9F                                      ShiftHLRight1

  52+ 6BD4
  53+ 6BD4              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  54+ 6BD4 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  55+ 6BD4 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  56+ 6BD4 ~                                    ld      e,a
  57+ 6BD4 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  58+ 6BD4 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  59+ 6BD4 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  60+ 6BD4 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  61+ 6BD4 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  62+ 6BD4 ~                                    ld      d,a
  63+ 6BD4 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  64+ 6BD4 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  65+ 6BD4 ~                                    ld      e,a
  66+ 6BD4 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  67+ 6BD4 ~                                    ld      a,d
  68+ 6BD4 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  69+ 6BD4 ~                                    ld      d,a
  70+ 6BD4                                      ENDM
