  91+ 6C15 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  92+ 6C16 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  93+ 6C18 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  94+ 6C19 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  95+ 6C1A                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  95+ 6C1A FA 32 6C    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  96+ 6C1D 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  97+ 6C1E B2                                   or      d
  98+ 6C1F                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  98+ 6C1F FA 24 6C    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  99+ 6C22 19                                   add     hl,de
 100+ 6C23 C9                                   ret
 101+ 6C24 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 102+ 6C25 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 103+ 6C27 67                                   ld      h,a
 104+ 6C28 7A                                   ld      a,d
 105+ 6C29 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 106+ 6C2B 57                                   ld      d,a
 107+ 6C2C 19                                   add     hl,de
 108+ 6C2D 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 109+ 6C2F B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 110+ 6C30 67                                   ld      h,a
 111+ 6C31 C9                                   ret
 112+ 6C32 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
 113+ 6C33 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 114+ 6C35 67                                   ld      h,a
 115+ 6C36 7A                                   ld      a,d
 116+ 6C37 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 117+ 6C39 57                                   ld      d,a
 118+ 6C3A B7                                   or      a
 119+ 6C3B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 120+ 6C3D 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 121+ 6C3F 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 122+ 6C40 B4                                   or      h
 123+ 6C41 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 124+ 6C42 C9                                   ret
 125+ 6C43              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 125+ 6C43 AF          >                    xor a
 125+ 6C44 95          >                    sub l
 125+ 6C45 6F          >                    ld l,a
 125+ 6C46 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 125+ 6C47 94          >                    sub h
 125+ 6C48 67          >                    ld h,a
 126+ 6C49 78                                   ld      a,b
 127+ 6C4A EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 128+ 6C4C B4                                   or      h
 129+ 6C4D 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 130+ 6C4E C9                                   ret

 132+ 6C4F
 133+ 6C4F                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
 134+ 6C4F                  ;
 135+ 6C4F                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
 136+ 6C4F                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 137+ 6C4F                  ;
 138+ 6C4F                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 139+ 6C4F                  ;         carry reset
 140+ 6C4F                  ;
 141+ 6C4F                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 142+ 6C4F 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 143+ 6C50 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 144+ 6C51 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 145+ 6C53 EB                                   ex de,hl
 146+ 6C54 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 147+ 6C56
 148+ 6C56 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 149+ 6C57 85                                   add a,l
 150+ 6C58 57                                   ld  d,a
 151+ 6C59 EB                                   ex de,hl
 152+ 6C5A
 153+ 6C5A 7A                                   ld  a,d
 154+ 6C5B CE 00                                adc a,0
 155+ 6C5D C9                                   ret
 156+ 6C5E
 157+ 6C5E 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 158+ 6C5F 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 159+ 6C60 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 160+ 6C62 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 161+ 6C63 C9                                   ret
 162+ 6C64
 163+ 6C64                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 164+ 6C64                 ;
 165+ 6C64                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 166+ 6C64                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 167+ 6C64                 ;
 168+ 6C64                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 169+ 6C64                 ;         carry reset
 170+ 6C64                 ;
 171+ 6C64                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl

 174+ 6C64
 175+ 6C64 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 176+ 6C65 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 177+ 6C66 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 178+ 6C67 6A                                   ld l,d
 179+ 6C68 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 180+ 6C69 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 181+ 6C6A              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 182+ 6C6A ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 183+ 6C6C EB                                   ex de,hl
 184+ 6C6D ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 185+ 6C6F
 186+ 6C6F AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 187+ 6C70 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 188+ 6C71 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 189+ 6C72
 190+ 6C72 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 191+ 6C73 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 192+ 6C74 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 193+ 6C76
 194+ 6C76 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 195+ 6C77 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 196+ 6C78
 197+ 6C78 7A                                   ld a,d
 198+ 6C79 85                                   add a,l
 199+ 6C7A 67                                   ld h,a
 200+ 6C7B 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 201+ 6C7C
 202+ 6C7C D1                                   pop de
 203+ 6C7D ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 204+ 6C7F
 205+ 6C7F EB                                   ex de,hl
 206+ 6C80 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 207+ 6C82 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 208+ 6C83
 209+ 6C83 C9                                   ret
 210+ 6C84
 211+ 6C84              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 212+ 6C84              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 213+ 6C84              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 214+ 6C84              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 215+ 6C84              ;         carry reset
 216+ 6C84              ; maths is
 217+ 6C84              ;        hl = y , de= x
 218+ 6C84              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 219+ 6C84              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 220+ 6C84              ;
 221+ 6C84              ;
 222+ 6C84              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 223+ 6C84 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 224+ 6C85 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 225+ 6C86 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 226+ 6C87 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 227+ 6C88 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 228+ 6C89 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 229+ 6C8A ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 230+ 6C8C EB                                   ex de,hl
 231+ 6C8D ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 232+ 6C8F 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 233+ 6C90 59                                   ld e,c
 234+ 6C91 50                                   ld d,b
 235+ 6C92 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 236+ 6C94 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 237+ 6C95 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 238+ 6C96 67                                   ld h,a
 239+ 6C97 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 240+ 6C98                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 241+ 6C98 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 242+ 6C99 C1                                   pop     bc
 243+ 6C9A C9                                   ret
 244+ 6C9B
 245+ 6C9B              ; multiplication of 16-bit numbers by 8-bit product
 246+ 6C9B              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 247+ 6C9B              ;          l = 8-bit multiplicand
 248+ 6C9B              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 249+ 6C9B              ;         carry reset
 250+ 6C9B              ; maths is
 251+ 6C9B              ;        hl = y , de= x
 252+ 6C9B              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 253+ 6C9B              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 254+ 6C9B              ;
 255+ 6C9B              ;
 256+ 6C9B              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 257+ 6C9B C5 E5 D5     mulDEbyLSigned:         push    bc,,hl,,de
 258+ 6C9E 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 259+ 6C9F 16 00                                ld d,0                      ; d = yh = 0
 260+ 6CA1 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 261+ 6CA2 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 262+ 6CA3 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 263+ 6CA4              ;                        mul                         ; yh * xl which will always be 0
 264+ 6CA4 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = xh yl
 265+ 6CA5 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 266+ 6CA7 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; hl = xh * yl
 267+ 6CA8              ;                        add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 268+ 6CA8 59                                   ld e,c                      ; de = yl xl
 269+ 6CA9 50                                   ld d,b                      ; .
 270+ 6CAA ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 271+ 6CAC 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 272+ 6CAD 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 273+ 6CAE 67                                   ld h,a
 274+ 6CAF 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 275+ 6CB0 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 276+ 6CB1 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; get de for sign
 277+ 6CB2 78                                   ld      a,b
 278+ 6CB3 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; get hl for sign
 279+ 6CB4 A8                                   xor     b
 280+ 6CB5 E6 80                                and     $80                 ; so we now have the sign bit
 281+ 6CB7 B4                                   or      h                   ; so set the sign
 282+ 6CB8 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 283+ 6CB9 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; clear up stack
 284+ 6CBA C9                                   ret
 285+ 6CBB
 286+ 6CBB                  DISPLAY "TODO: TEST"
 287+ 6CBB 7A           mulDEbyHLSigned:        ld  a,d                     ; de = abs de
 288+ 6CBC 47                                   ld  b,a                     ;
 289+ 6CBD E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; .
 290+ 6CBF 57                                   ld  d,a                     ; .
 291+ 6CC0 7C                                   ld  a,h                     ; hl = abs hl
 292+ 6CC1 4F                                   ld  c,a                     ; .
 293+ 6CC2 E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; .
 294+ 6CC4 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 295+ 6CC5 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; ixl = target sign of de * hl
 296+ 6CC6 AA                                   xor     d                   ;
 297+ 6CC7 E6 80                                and     $80                 ;
 298+ 6CC9 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a               ;
 299+ 6CCB CD 84 6C                             call    mulDEbyHL           ; calculate ABS(DE) * ABS(HL)
 300+ 6CCE 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; recover sign bit
 301+ 6CCF DD B5                                or      ixl
 302+ 6CD1 67                                   ld      h,a
 303+ 6CD2 C9                                   ret
 304+ 6CD3
 305+ 6CD3              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 306+ 6CD3              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 307+ 6CD3 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 308+ 6CD4 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 309+ 6CD5 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 310+ 6CD7 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 311+ 6CD9 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 312+ 6CDA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 313+ 6CDC 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 314+ 6CDD 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 315+ 6CDE E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 316+ 6CE0              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 317+ 6CE0 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 318+ 6CE1 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 319+ 6CE2 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 320+ 6CE4 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 321+ 6CE5 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 322+ 6CE6 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 323+ 6CE7 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 324+ 6CE8 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 325+ 6CE9 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 326+ 6CEA ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 327+ 6CEC 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 328+ 6CED 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 329+ 6CEE 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 330+ 6CEF 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 331+ 6CF0 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 332+ 6CF1 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 333+ 6CF2 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 334+ 6CF3 ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 335+ 6CF5 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 336+ 6CF6 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 337+ 6CF7 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 338+ 6CF9 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 339+ 6CFA C9                                   ret
 340+ 6CFB
 341+ 6CFB              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 342+ 6CFB              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 343+ 6CFB              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 344+ 6CFB              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 345+ 6CFB              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 346+ 6CFB              ;mult3
 347+ 6CFB              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 348+ 6CFB              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 349+ 6CFB              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 350+ 6CFB              ; Algorithm
 351+ 6CFB              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 352+ 6CFB              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 353+ 6CFB              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 354+ 6CFB              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 355+ 6CFB              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 356+ 6CFB              ;
 357+ 6CFB              ;
 358+ 6CFB 7A           mulHLbyDE2sc:           ld      a,d
 359+ 6CFC AC                                   xor     h
 360+ 6CFD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 361+ 6CFF FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; save sign bit for result
 362+ 6D01 7C                                   ld      a,h
 363+ 6D02 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 364+ 6D04 28 06                                jr      z,.HLPositive
 365+ 6D06              .HLNegative:            NegHL
 365+ 6D06 AF          >                    xor a
 365+ 6D07 95          >                    sub l
 365+ 6D08 6F          >                    ld l,a
 365+ 6D09 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 365+ 6D0A 94          >                    sub h
 365+ 6D0B 67          >                    ld h,a
 366+ 6D0C 7A           .HLPositive:            ld      a,d
 367+ 6D0D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 368+ 6D0F 28 06                                jr      z,.DEPositive
 369+ 6D11              .DENegative:            NegDE
 369+ 6D11 AF          >                    xor a
 369+ 6D12 93          >                    sub e
 369+ 6D13 5F          >                    ld e,a
 369+ 6D14 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 369+ 6D15 92          >                    sub d
 369+ 6D16 57          >                    ld d,a
 370+ 6D17 CD 84 6C     .DEPositive:            call    mulDEbyHL           ; now do calc
 371+ 6D1A FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 372+ 6D1C A7                                   and     a                   ; if its 0 then we are good
 373+ 6D1D C8                                   ret     z
 374+ 6D1E
 375+ 6D1E
 376+ 6D1E              ; Mulitply HLE by D leading Sign
 377+ 6D1E              ; used IY A BC
 378+ 6D1E              ; result it loaded to DELC
 379+ 6D1E 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 380+ 6D1F AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 381+ 6D20 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 382+ 6D22 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 383+ 6D24 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 384+ 6D25 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 385+ 6D27 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 386+ 6D28 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 387+ 6D29 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 388+ 6D2B 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 389+ 6D2C B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 390+ 6D2D 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 391+ 6D2F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 392+ 6D30 B5                                   or      l
 393+ 6D31 B3                                   or      e
 394+ 6D32 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 395+ 6D34              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 396+ 6D34 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 397+ 6D35 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 398+ 6D37 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 399+ 6D38 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 400+ 6D3A 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 401+ 6D3B 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 402+ 6D3C ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 403+ 6D3E FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 404+ 6D40 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 405+ 6D41 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 406+ 6D42 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 407+ 6D44 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 408+ 6D45 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 409+ 6D46 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 410+ 6D48 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 411+ 6D4A 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 412+ 6D4B 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 413+ 6D4C 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 414+ 6D4D CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 415+ 6D4F FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 416+ 6D51 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 417+ 6D52 C9                                   ret
 418+ 6D53 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 419+ 6D56                                      ZeroA
 419+ 6D56 AF          >                        xor a
 420+ 6D57 4F                                   ld      c,a
 421+ 6D58 6F                                   ld      l,a
 422+ 6D59 C9                                   ret
 423+ 6D5A
 424+ 6D5A              ;;;
 425+ 6D5A              ;;;
 426+ 6D5A              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 427+ 6D5A              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 428+ 6D5A              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 429+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 430+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 431+ 6D5A              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 432+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 433+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 434+ 6D5A              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 435+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 436+ 6D5A              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 437+ 6D5A              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 438+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 439+ 6D5A              ;;;                        or      l
 440+ 6D5A              ;;;                        or      e
 441+ 6D5A              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 442+ 6D5A              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 443+ 6D5A              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 444+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 445+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 446+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 447+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 448+ 6D5A              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 449+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 450+ 6D5A              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 451+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 452+ 6D5A              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 453+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 454+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 455+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 456+ 6D5A              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 457+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 458+ 6D5A              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 459+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 460+ 6D5A              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 461+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 462+ 6D5A              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 463+ 6D5A              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 464+ 6D5A              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 465+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 466+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ret
 467+ 6D5A              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 468+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ZeroA
 469+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 470+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 471+ 6D5A              ;;;                        ret
 472+ 6D5A
 473+ 6D5A              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 474+ 6D5A              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 475+ 6D5A              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 476+ 6D5A              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 477+ 6D5A              ;         carry reset
 478+ 6D5A              ;
 479+ 6D5A              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 480+ 6D5A 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 481+ 6D5B AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 482+ 6D5C 32 5A 6D                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 483+ 6D5F 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 484+ 6D60 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 485+ 6D63 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 486+ 6D65 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 487+ 6D67 57                                   ld      d,a
 488+ 6D68 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 489+ 6D6A 32 5A 6D                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 490+ 6D6D 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 491+ 6D6E ED 27 80                             test    $80
 492+ 6D71 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 493+ 6D73 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 494+ 6D75 67                                   ld      h,a
 495+ 6D76 3A 5A 6D                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 496+ 6D79 EE 80                                xor     $80
 497+ 6D7B 32 5A 6D                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 498+ 6D7E CD 84 6C     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 499+ 6D81 3A 5A 6D     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 500+ 6D84 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 501+ 6D87 C8                                   ret     z
 502+ 6D88 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 503+ 6D89 95                                   sub 	l
 504+ 6D8A 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 505+ 6D8B 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 506+ 6D8C 94                                   sub 	h
 507+ 6D8D 67                                   ld 		h,a
 508+ 6D8E C9                                   ret
 509+ 6D8F
 510+ 6D8F AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 511+ 6D90 32 5A 6D                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 512+ 6D93 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 513+ 6D94 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 514+ 6D97 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 515+ 6D99 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 516+ 6D9B 57                                   ld      d,a
 517+ 6D9C 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 518+ 6D9E 32 5A 6D                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 519+ 6DA1 CD 84 6C     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 520+ 6DA4 3A 5A 6D     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 521+ 6DA7 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 522+ 6DAA C8                                   ret     z
 523+ 6DAB AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 524+ 6DAC 95                                   sub 	l
 525+ 6DAD 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 526+ 6DAE 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 527+ 6DAF 94                                   sub 	h
 528+ 6DB0 67                                   ld 		h,a
 529+ 6DB1 C9                                   ret
 530+ 6DB2
 531+ 6DB2
# file closed: ../../Maths/multiply.asm
 487  6DB2                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ 6DB2              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 6DB2              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ 6DB2
   4+ 6DB2              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ 6DB2 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ 6DB2 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ 6DB2 ~            			mul
   8+ 6DB2              			ENDM
   9+ 6DB2
  10+ 6DB2              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ 6DB2 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ 6DB2 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ 6DB2 ~            			mul
  14+ 6DB2 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ 6DB2              			ENDM
  16+ 6DB2
# file closed: ../../Maths/asm_square.asm
 488  6DB2                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/asm_sine.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/asm_sine.asm
   1+ 6DB2              ;- MACROS
   2+ 6DB2              LookupSineAMacro:       MACRO
   3+ 6DB2 ~                                    ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   4+ 6DB2 ~                                    add     hl, a
   5+ 6DB2 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
   6+ 6DB2                                      ENDM
   7+ 6DB2
   8+ 6DB2              ; Gets the sine of A from the lookup table into A
   9+ 6DB2              LookupSineA:            LookupSineAMacro
   9+ 6DB2 21 5B 6E    >                        ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   9+ 6DB5 ED 31       >                        add     hl, a
   9+ 6DB7 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
  10+ 6DB8 C9                                   ret
  11+ 6DB9
# file closed: ../../Maths/asm_sine.asm
 489  6DB9                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ 6DB9              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 6DB9              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ 6DB9              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ 6DB9              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ 6DB9              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ 6DB9              asm_sqrt:
   7+ 6DB9 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ 6DBC 61           	ld h,c
   9+ 6DBD 69           	ld l,c
  10+ 6DBE              .sqrloop:
  11+ 6DBE CB 38        	srl b
  12+ 6DC0 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ 6DC2 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ 6DC3 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 6DC4 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ 6DC6 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ 6DC8 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ 6DC9 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ 6DCA 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ 6DCC              .sqrbit:
  21+ 6DCC 19           	add hl,de
  22+ 6DCD EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ 6DCE B7           	or a
  24+ 6DCF ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ 6DD1              .sqrfi:
  26+ 6DD1 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ 6DD3 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ 6DD5 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ 6DD7 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ 6DD9 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ 6DDB C9           	ret
  32+ 6DDC
  33+ 6DDC
  34+ 6DDC              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ 6DDC 3A 73 67     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ 6DDF 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ 6DE0 3A 74 67     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ 6DE3 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ 6DE4 CD B9 6D     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ 6DE7 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ 6DE8 32 73 67     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ 6DEB C9           	ret
  43+ 6DEC
# file closed: ../../Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 490  6DEC                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/asm_arctan.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/asm_arctan.asm
   1+ 6DEC              ;Calculate A = arctan(P / Q)
   2+ 6DEC              ; This finds the angle in the right-angled triangle where the opposite side to angle A is length P and the adjacent side to angle A has
   3+ 6DEC              ; length Q, so:  tan(A) = P / Q
   4+ 6DEC              ;
   5+ 6DEC              ; The result in A is an integer representing the angle in radians. The routine returns values in the range 0 to 128,  (or 0 to PI radians).
   6+ 6DEC 3A 73 66     ARCTAN:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set T1 = P EOR Q, which will have the sign of P * Q
   7+ 6DEF 21 73 67                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; EOR Q
   8+ 6DF2 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
   9+ 6DF3 32 70 66                             ld      (varT1),a                   ; STA T1
  10+ 6DF6 3A 73 67                             ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDA Q                  \ If Q = 0, jump to AR2 to return a right angle
  11+ 6DF9 A7                                   and     a                           ; BEQ AR2
  12+ 6DFA CA 3C 6E                             jp      z, .AR2                     ; .
  13+ 6DFD CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Set Q = |Q| * 2 (this is a quick way of clearing the
  14+ 6DFF 32 73 67                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ sign bit, and we don't need to shift right again as we only ever use this value in the division with |P| * 2, which we set next)
  15+ 6E02 3A 73 66                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set A = |P| * 2
  16+ 6E05 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A
  17+ 6E07 32 73 66                             ld      (varP),a
  18+ 6E0A 21 73 67                             ld      hl,varQ
  19+ 6E0D BE                                   cp      (hl)                        ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, i.e. |P| > |Q|, jump to AR1 to swap P
  20+ 6E0E D2 20 6E                             jp      nc, .AR1                    ; BCS AR1                \ and Q around, so we can still use the lookup table
  21+ 6E11 CD 48 6E                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table:  A = arctan(A / Q)  = arctan(|P / Q|)
  22+ 6E14                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag so the SBC instruction in AR3 will be correct, should we jump there
  22+ 6E14 B7          >                        or a
  23+ 6E15 4F           .AR4:                   ld      c,a                         ; as we have to use a we use c as a temp, we can't push af as we would loose flags on pop
  24+ 6E16 3A 70 66                             ld      a,(varT1)                   ; LDX T1                 \ If T1 is negative, i.e. P and Q have different signs,
  25+ 6E19 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  26+ 6E1A A7                                   and     a                           ; BMI AR3                \ jump down to AR3 to return arctan(-|P / Q|)
  27+ 6E1B 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; .                      \ we need to get a back before jump
  28+ 6E1C FA 3F 6E                             jp      m, .AR3                     ; .
  29+ 6E1F C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Otherwise P and Q have the same sign, so our result is correct and we can return from the subroutine
  30+ 6E20              ; We want to calculate arctan(t) where |t| > 1, so we can use the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 64 - arctan(1 / t)
  31+ 6E20              ; In the 6502 verion it works with A already being P but we will fetch it
  32+ 6E20 3A 73 67     .AR1:                   ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDX Q                  \ Swap the values in Q and P, using the fact that we
  33+ 6E23 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  34+ 6E24 3A 73 66                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; STA Q                  \ called AR1 with A = P
  35+ 6E27 32 73 67                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
  36+ 6E2A 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; TXA                    \ This also sets A = P (which now contains the original argument |Q|)
  37+ 6E2B 32 73 66                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STX P                  \
  38+ 6E2E CD 48 6E                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table: A = arctan(A / Q) = arctan(|Q / P|) = arctan(1 / |P / Q|)
  39+ 6E31 32 8F 67                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T                  \ Set T = 64 - T, we use B as T (its not really that)
  40+ 6E34 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; its actually t = a, a = 64-a
  41+ 6E35 3E 40                                ld      a,64                        ; LDA #64 What is going on here is t = result
  42+ 6E37                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                            a = 64- result
  42+ 6E37 B7          >                        or a
  43+ 6E38 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; .
  44+ 6E39 C3 15 6E                             jp      .AR4                        ; BCS AR4                \ Jump to AR4 to continue the calculation (this BCS is effectively a JMP as the subtraction will never underflow, as ARS1 returns values in the range 0-31)
  45+ 6E3C              ; If we get here then Q = 0, so tan(A) = infinity and A is a right angle, or 0.25 of a circle. We allocate 255 to a full circle, so we should return 63 for a right angle
  46+ 6E3C 3E 3F        .AR2:                   ld      a,63                        ; LDA #63                \ Set A to 63, to represent a right angle
  47+ 6E3E C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  48+ 6E3F              ; A contains arctan(|P / Q|) but P and Q have different signs, so we need to return arctan(-|P / Q|), using the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 128 - A
  49+ 6E3F 32 8F 67     .AR3:                   ld      (varT),a
  50+ 6E42 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; STA T                  \ Set A = 128 - A, we use b as T
  51+ 6E43 3E 80                                ld      a,128                       ; LDA #128               \
  52+ 6E45                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                  \ The subtraction will work because we did a SEC before calling AR3
  52+ 6E45 B7          >                        or a
  53+ 6E46 98                                   sbc     a,b
  54+ 6E47 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  55+ 6E48              ; This routine fetches arctan(A / Q) from the ACT table, so A will be set to an integer in the range 0 to 31 that represents an angle from 0 to 45 degrees (or 0 to \ PI / 4 radians)
  56+ 6E48 CD 68 7C     ARS1:                   call    LL28Amul256DivQ_6502        ; JSR LL28               \ Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q
  57+ 6E4B 3A 74 67                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set X = R / 8
  58+ 6E4E CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \       = 32 * A / Q
  59+ 6E50 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \
  60+ 6E52 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ so X has the value t * 32 where t = A / Q, which is
  61+ 6E54 21 7B 6E                             ld      hl,ACT                      ; TAX                    \ what we need to look up values in the ACT table
  62+ 6E57 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ; LDA ACT,X              \ Fetch ACT+X from the ACT table into A, so now:
  63+ 6E59 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                        \   A = value in ACT + X = value in ACT + (32 * A / Q)= arctan(A / Q)
  64+ 6E5A C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  65+ 6E5B
  66+ 6E5B              ;;;arctan:										; .ARCTAN	\ -> &2A3C  \ A=TAN-1(P/Q) \ A=arctan (P/Q)  called from block E
  67+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; a = var P
  68+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		hl,varQ
  69+ 6E5B              ;;;		xor		(hl)						; a = var p XOR varQ
  70+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		a,(varT1)					; \ T1	 \ quadrant info
  71+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		c,a							; c = copy of T1
  72+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; Q
  73+ 6E5B              ;;;		cp		0
  74+ 6E5B              ;;;		jr		z,.AR2						;  Q=0 so set angle to 63, pi/2
  75+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; Q move to reg B?
  76+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		d,a							; copy to reg d
  77+ 6E5B              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  78+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; P
  79+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		e,a							; copy to reg e
  80+ 6E5B              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  81+ 6E5B              ;;;		cp		d							; compare with b (unsigned varQ * 2)
  82+ 6E5B              ;;;		jr		nc, .ars1					; if q >  p then adjust  swop A and Q as A >= Q
  83+ 6E5B              ;;;		call	ars1						; \ ARS1 \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
  84+ 6E5B              ;;;		scf									; set carry flag
  85+ 6E5B              ;;;.ar4:										; sub o.k
  86+ 6E5B              ;;;		bit 	7,c							; is T1 (also in c) negative?
  87+ 6E5B              ;;;		jr		nz,.ar3						;  -ve quadrant
  88+ 6E5B              ;;;		ret
  89+ 6E5B              ;;;.ar1:										; swop A and Q entering here d = q and e = P
  90+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		a,d							; a = varQ
  91+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		d,e							; varQ = varP
  92+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		e,a							; swap D and E around
  93+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		(varP),a					; write to actual variables
  94+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		a,d
  95+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; write to actual variables
  96+ 6E5B              ;;;		call	.ars1
  97+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		(varT),b
  98+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		b,a							; B = T = angle
  99+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		a,64						; next range of angle, pi/4 to pi/2
 100+ 6E5B              ;;;		sub		a,b							; a = 64 - T (or b)
 101+ 6E5B              ;;;		jr		nc,.ar4						;  sub o.k
 102+ 6E5B              ;;;.ar2:										; .AR2	\ set angle to 90 degrees
 103+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld 		a,&3F						;  #63
 104+ 6E5B              ;;;		ret
 105+ 6E5B              ;;;.ar3:										;.AR3	\ -ve quadrant
 106+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		b,a							; b = T	= \ angle
 107+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		a,ConstPi					; a = Pi
 108+ 6E5B              ;;;		sub		b,a							; A = 128-T, so now covering range pi/2 to pi correctly
 109+ 6E5B              ;;;		ret
 110+ 6E5B              ;;;.ars1:										; .ARS1	\ -> &2A75  \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
 111+ 6E5B              ;;;		call	RequAmul256divQ				;  LL28 \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
 112+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		a,(regA)
 113+ 6E5B              ;;;		srl		a
 114+ 6E5B              ;;;		srl		a
 115+ 6E5B              ;;;		srl		a							;  31 max.
 116+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		hl, ArcTanTable				; root of index into table at end of words data
 117+ 6E5B              ;;;		add		hl,a						; now at real data
 118+ 6E5B              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; a =  ACT[a]
 119+ 6E5B              ;;;.arsr:										; rts used by laser lines below (will not in later code)
 120+ 6E5B              ;;;		ret
 121+ 6E5B
 122+ 6E5B
 123+ 6E5B
# file closed: ../../Maths/asm_arctan.asm
 491  6E5B                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/SineTable.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/SineTable.asm
   1+ 6E5B              ;; PRINT "SIN TABLE"
   2+ 6E5B              ;; FOR I% =  0 TO  31
   3+ 6E5B              ;; N = ABS(SIN((I%/64)*2*PI))
   4+ 6E5B              ;; IF N >= 1 THEN B% = 255  ELSE B% = INT(256 * N + 0.5)
   5+ 6E5B              ;; PRINT B%
   6+ 6E5B              ;; NEXT I%
   7+ 6E5B
   8+ 6E5B
   9+ 6E5B 00 19 32 4A  SNE:            DB 000, 025, 050, 074, 098, 121, 142, 162
   9+ 6E5F 62 79 8E A2
  10+ 6E63 B5 C6 D5 E2                  DB 181, 198, 213, 226, 237, 245, 251, 255
  10+ 6E67 ED F5 FB FF
  11+ 6E6B FF FF FB F5                  DB 255, 255, 251, 245, 237, 226, 213, 198
  11+ 6E6F ED E2 D5 C6
  12+ 6E73 B5 A2 8E 79                  DB 181, 162, 142, 121, 098, 074, 050, 025
  12+ 6E77 62 4A 32 19
# file closed: ../../Maths/SineTable.asm
 492  6E7B                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/ArcTanTable.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/ArcTanTable.asm
   1+ 6E7B              ;PRINT "ARCTAN TABLE"
   2+ 6E7B              ;FOR I% = 0 TO 31
   3+ 6E7B              ;    PRINT INT((128/PI) * ATN(I%/32)+0.5)
   4+ 6E7B              ;NEXT I%
   5+ 6E7B
   6+ 6E7B 00 01 03 04  ACT:            DB 000, 001, 003, 004, 005, 006, 008, 009
   6+ 6E7F 05 06 08 09
   7+ 6E83 0A 0B 0C 0D                  DB 010, 011, 012, 013, 015, 016, 017, 018
   7+ 6E87 0F 10 11 12
   8+ 6E8B 13 14 15 16                  DB 019, 020, 021, 022, 023, 024, 025, 025
   8+ 6E8F 17 18 19 19
   9+ 6E93 1A 1B 1C 1D                  DB 026, 027, 028, 029, 030, 031, 031, 031
