 493  6E9B                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ 6E9B              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ 6E9B              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ 6E9B                      ; Input:
   4+ 6E9B                      ;       HL = value
   5+ 6E9B                      ; Output:
   6+ 6E9B                      ;       HL = -value
   7+ 6E9B                      ; Destroys:
   8+ 6E9B                      ;       AF
   9+ 6E9B                      ;
  10+ 6E9B              negate16:
  11+ 6E9B AF           negate16hl:         xor 	a
  12+ 6E9C 95                               sub 	l
  13+ 6E9D 6F                               ld 		l,a
  14+ 6E9E 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  15+ 6E9F 94                               sub 	h
  16+ 6EA0 67                               ld 		h,a
  17+ 6EA1 C9                               ret
  18+ 6EA2
  19+ 6EA2 AF           negate16de:         xor 	a
  20+ 6EA3 93                               sub 	e
  21+ 6EA4 5F                               ld 		e,a
  22+ 6EA5 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  23+ 6EA6 92                               sub 	d
  24+ 6EA7 57                               ld 		d,a
  25+ 6EA8 C9                               ret
  26+ 6EA9
  27+ 6EA9 AF           negate16bc:         xor 	a
  28+ 6EAA 91                               sub 	c
  29+ 6EAB 4F                               ld 		c,a
  30+ 6EAC 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  31+ 6EAD 90                               sub 	b
  32+ 6EAE 47                               ld 		b,a
  33+ 6EAF C9                               ret
  34+ 6EB0
# file closed: ../../Maths/negate16.asm
 494  6EB0                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ 6EB0              ;   K(3 2 1 0)           The result of the division
   2+ 6EB0              ;   X                    X is preserved
   3+ 6EB0
   4+ 6EB0              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) where zsign hi lo is in DE with zsign leading hi
   5+ 6EB0 00 00 00 00  varQRS                 DS      4
   6+ 6EB4 00 00 00     varAPP                  DS     3
   7+ 6EB7
   8+ 6EB7                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  neds rewrite of whoel DIDV3B2"
   9+ 6EB7              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO OF WHOLE DIVD3B2
  10+ 6EB7              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO
  11+ 6EB7
  12+ 6EB7              ; b = varR, c= varQ
  13+ 6EB7              Requ256mulAdivQ_6502:
  14+ 6EB7 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                   \ Shift A to the left
  15+ 6EB9 DA CE 6E                             jp      c,.LL29_6502             ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  16+ 6EBC                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  16+ 6EBC 3F          >                        ccf
  17+ 6EBD                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  17+ 6EBD B9          >                        cp      c
  17+ 6EBE DA C3 6E    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  18+ 6EC1                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  19+ 6EC1 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  20+ 6EC2                                      ClearCarryFlag
  20+ 6EC2 B7          >                        or a
  21+ 6EC3              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  21+ 6EC3 3F          >                        ccf
  22+ 6EC4 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  23+ 6EC6 DA B7 6E                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  24+ 6EC9 78                                   ld      a,b
  25+ 6ECA 32 86 EF                             ld      (Rvar),a
  26+ 6ECD C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  27+ 6ECE 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  28+ 6ECF                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  28+ 6ECF 37          >                        scf
  29+ 6ED0 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  30+ 6ED2 DA B7 6E                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  31+ 6ED5 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  32+ 6ED6 32 86 EF                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
  33+ 6ED9 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  34+ 6EDA 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  35+ 6EDC 32 74 67                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  36+ 6EDF 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; as we are using b as varR
  37+ 6EE0                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  37+ 6EE0 37          >                        scf
  38+ 6EE1 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  39+ 6EE2
  40+ 6EE2
  41+ 6EE2 00           DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG:       DB      0
  42+ 6EE3
  43+ 6EE3 7B           DIV3B2DE:               ld      a,e                         ; load QRS with Z sign hi lo
  44+ 6EE4 32 B2 6E                             ld      (varQRS+2),a
  45+ 6EE7 7A                                   ld      a,d
  46+ 6EE8 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  47+ 6EEA 32 B1 6E                             ld      (varQRS+1),a
  48+ 6EED 7A                                   ld      a,d
  49+ 6EEE E6 80                                and     $80
  50+ 6EF0 32 B0 6E                             ld      (varQRS),a
  51+ 6EF3 C3 F9 6E                             jp      DVID3B
  52+ 6EF6              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) = A P[1 0 ] / (SRQ)
  53+ 6EF6              ; We don't use zlo and assume its already loaded into SRQ
  54+ 6EF6 32 75 66     DVID3B2:                ld      (varP+2),a                  ;STA P+2                \ Set P+2 = A
  55+ 6EF9                                                                          ; LDA INWK+6             \ Set Q = z_lo
  56+ 6EF9                                                                          ; STA Q
  57+ 6EF9                                                                          ; LDA INWK+7             \ Set R = z_hi
  58+ 6EF9                                                                          ; STA R
  59+ 6EF9                                                                          ; LDA INWK+8             \ Set S = z_sign
  60+ 6EF9                                                                          ; STA S
  61+ 6EF9              ;  Given the above assignments, we now want to calculate K(3 2 1 0) = P(2 1 0) / (S R Q)
  62+ 6EF9 3A 73 66     DVID3B:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                 \ Make sure P(2 1 0) is at least 1
  63+ 6EFC F6 01                                or      1                           ; ORA #1
  64+ 6EFE 32 73 66                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STA P
  65+ 6F01              ;--- t = sign of P2 xor S (i.e. sign of result) ------------;
  66+ 6F01 3A 75 66                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set T to the sign of P+2 * S (i.e. the sign of the
  67+ 6F04 21 75 67                             ld      hl, varS                    ; EOR S                  \ result) and store it in T
  68+ 6F07 AE                                   xor     (hl)
  69+ 6F08 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; AND #%10000000
  70+ 6F0A 32 8F 67                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T
  71+ 6F0D              ;--- New bit added to aviod a divde by 0 -------------------;
  72+ 6F0D 3A 73 67     .CheckQRSAtLeast1:      ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
  73+ 6F10 21 74 67                             ld      hl,varR                     ;
  74+ 6F13 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ;
  75+ 6F14 C2 1C 6F                             jp      nz,.DVL9Prep                ;
  76+ 6F17 3E 01                                ld      a,1                         ;
  77+ 6F19 32 73 67                             ld      (varQ),a                    ;
  78+ 6F1C              ; A P(1) P(0) = ABS P(2 1 0)
  79+ 6F1C 06 00        .DVL9Prep:              ld      b,0                         ; LDY #0                 \ Set Y = 0 to store the scale factor (use b as Y)
  80+ 6F1E 3A 75 66                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Clear the sign bit of P+2, so the division can be done
  81+ 6F21 E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111         \ with positive numbers and we'll set the correct sign below, once all the maths is done
  82+ 6F23              ; We now shift (A P+1 P) left until A >= 64, counting the number of shifts in Y. This makes the top part of the division as large as possible, thus retaining as
  83+ 6F23              ; much accuracy as we can.  When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the number of places in Y, and in the correct direction
  84+ 6F23                                      DISPLAY "TODO DVL9 and DVL6 move P and QRS into registers for faster shift"
  85+ 6F23              ;-- while A < 64 shift A P(1) P(0) -------------------------;
  86+ 6F23 FE 40        .DVL9:                  cp      64                          ; CMP #64                \ If A >= 64, jump down to DV14
  87+ 6F25 D2 36 6F                             jp      nc, .DV14                   ; BCS DV14
  88+ 6F28 21 73 66                             ld      hl,varP                     ; ASL P                  \ Shift (A P+1 P) to the left
  89+ 6F2B CB 26                                sla     (hl)
  90+ 6F2D 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL P+1
  91+ 6F2E CB 16                                rl      (hl)
  92+ 6F30 CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
  93+ 6F32 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
  94+ 6F33 C3 23 6F                             jp      .DVL9                       ; BNE DVL9               \ Loop up to DVL9 (this BNE is effectively a JMP, as Y will never be zero)
  95+ 6F36              ; If we get here, A >= 64 and contains the highest byte of the numerator, scaled up by the number of left shifts in Y (b in our code)
  96+ 6F36 32 75 66     .DV14:                  ld      (varP+2),a                  ; Store A in P+2, so we now have the scaled value of the numerator in P(2 1 0)
  97+ 6F39 3A 75 67                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; LDA S                  \ Set A = |S|
  98+ 6F3C E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111
  99+ 6F3E                                      ;nop                                ;  BMI DV9               \ If bit 7 of A is set, jump down to DV9 (which can never happen)
 100+ 6F3E              ; We now shift (S R Q) left until bit 7 of S is set, reducing Y by the number of shifts. This makes the bottom part of the division as large as possible, thus
 101+ 6F3E              ; retaining as much accuracy as we can. When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the total number of places in Y, and in the correct
 102+ 6F3E              ; direction, to give us the correct result
 103+ 6F3E              ; We set A to |S| above, so the following actually shifts (A R Q)
 104+ 6F3E 05           .DVL6:                  dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y (b)
 105+ 6F3F 21 73 67                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; ASL Q                  \ Shift (A R Q) to the left
 106+ 6F42 CB 26                                sla     (hl)                        ; .
 107+ 6F44 21 74 67                             ld      hl,varR                     ; ROL R
 108+ 6F47 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 109+ 6F49 CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
 110+ 6F4B F2 3E 6F                             jp      p,.DVL6                     ; BPL DVL6               \ Loop up to DVL6 to do another shift, until bit 7 of A is set and we can't shift left any further
 111+ 6F4E              ; We have now shifted both the numerator and denominator left as far as they will go, keeping a tally of the overall scale factor of the various shifts in Y. We
 112+ 6F4E              ; can now divide just the two highest bytes to get our result
 113+ 6F4E 32 73 67     .DV9:                   ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ Set Q = A, the highest byte of the denominator
 114+ 6F51 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; for Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 as it uses c as Q
 115+ 6F52 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; preserve shift register in DEVD3B_SHIFT_REG
 116+ 6F53 32 E2 6E                             ld      (DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG),a
 117+ 6F56              ; Note in Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 we use B as R Var for shift register
 118+ 6F56 06 FE                                ld      b,254                       ; LDA #254               \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can pass this to
 119+ 6F58 32 74 67                             ld      (varR),a                    ; STA R                  \ LL31 to act as the bit counter in the division
 120+ 6F5B 3A 75 66                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set A to the highest byte of the numerator
 121+ 6F5E CD B7 6E                             call    Requ256mulAdivQ_6502        ; JSR LL31               \ Call LL31 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q which means result is in b
 122+ 6F61              ; The result of our division is now in R, so we just need to shift it back by the scale factor in Y
 123+ 6F61                                      ZeroA                               ; LDA #0                \ Set K(3 2 1) = 0 to hold the result (we populate K)
 123+ 6F61 AF          >                        xor a
 124+ 6F62 32 87 67                             ld      (varK+1),a                  ; STA K+1               \ next)
 125+ 6F65 32 88 67                             ld      (varK+2),a                  ; STA K+2
 126+ 6F68 32 89 67                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 127+ 6F6B 3A E2 6E                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)        ; TYA                   \ If Y (shift counter in b) is positive, jump to DV12
 128+ 6F6E B7                                   or      a                           ; .                      we want to check the sign or if its zero
 129+ 6F6F CA 9A 6F                             jp      z,.DV13                     ; Optimisation to save a second jump from DV12 to DV13
 130+ 6F72 F2 A5 6F                             jp      p,.DV12                     ; BPL DV12
 131+ 6F75              ; If we get here then Y is negative, so we need to shift the result R to the left by Y places, and then set the correct sign for the result
 132+ 6F75                                      DISPLAY "TODO check oprimisation here for var r  in b"
 133+ 6F75 48                                   ld      c,b
 134+ 6F76 3A E2 6E                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 135+ 6F79 47                                   ld      b,a
 136+ 6F7A 79                                   ld      a,c
 137+ 6F7B                                      ; OPTIM ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 138+ 6F7B CB 27        .DVL8:                  sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Shift (K+3 K+2 K+1 A) left
 139+ 6F7D 21 87 67                             ld      hl,varK+1                   ; ROL K+1
 140+ 6F80 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 141+ 6F82 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+2
 142+ 6F83 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 143+ 6F85 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+3
 144+ 6F86 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 145+ 6F88 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
 146+ 6F89 C2 7B 6F                             jp      nz,.DVL8                    ; BNE DVL8               \ Loop back to DVL8 until we have shifted left by Y places
 147+ 6F8C 32 86 67                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 148+ 6F8F 3A 89 67                             ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; LDA K+3                \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 149+ 6F92 21 8F 67                             ld      hl,varT                     ; ORA T                  \ correct sign for the result
 150+ 6F95 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; .
 151+ 6F96 32 89 67                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 152+ 6F99 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 153+ 6F9A              ; If we get here then Y is zero, so we don't need to shift the result R, we just need to set the correct sign for the result
 154+ 6F9A 78           .DV13:                  ld      a,b; varR)                  ; LDA R                  \ Store R in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 155+ 6F9B 32 86 67                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K
 156+ 6F9E 3A 8F 67                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 157+ 6FA1 32 89 67                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 158+ 6FA4 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 159+ 6FA5              ; if we get here U is positive but still could be zero, now this is handled in DV9
 160+ 6FA5              .DV12:                  ; nop                               ; BEQ DV13               \ We jumped here having set A to the scale factor in Y, so this jumps up to DV13 if Y = 0
 161+ 6FA5              ; If we get here then Y is positive and non-zero, so we need to shift the result R to the right by Y places and then set the correct sign for the result. We also
 162+ 6FA5              ; know that K(3 2 1) will stay 0, as we are shifting the lowest byte to the right, so no set bits will make their way into the top three bytes
 163+ 6FA5                                      ;ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 164+ 6FA5 48                                   ld      c,b
 165+ 6FA6 3A E2 6E                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 166+ 6FA9 47                                   ld      b,a
 167+ 6FAA 79                                   ld      a,c
 168+ 6FAB CB 3F        .DVL10:                 srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ Shift A right
 169+ 6FAD 05                                   dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y
 170+ 6FAE C2 AB 6F                             jp      nz,.DVL10                   ; BNE DVL10              \ Loop back to DVL10 until we have shifted right by Y places
 171+ 6FB1 32 86 67                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store the shifted A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 172+ 6FB4 3A 8F 67                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 173+ 6FB7 32 89 67                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 174+ 6FBA C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 175+ 6FBB              ;
 176+ 6FBB              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
 177+ 6FBB              ;   Loop:   A << 2
 178+ 6FBB              ;           if carry was 0
 179+ 6FBB              ;               if a >= D
 180+ 6FBB              ;                   A = A - D
 181+ 6FBB              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
 182+ 6FBB              ;           else
 183+ 6FBB
 184+ 6FBB              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
 185+ 6FBB              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
 186+ 6FBB              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
 187+ 6FBB              ;
 188+ 6FBB              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 189+ 6FBB              ;
 190+ 6FBB              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
 191+ 6FBB              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
 192+ 6FBB
 193+ 6FBB 57           DVIDT:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 194+ 6FBC 3A 73 67                             ld      a,(varQ)
 195+ 6FBF 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; C = var Q
 196+ 6FC0 3A 73 66                             ld      a,(varP)
 197+ 6FC3 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 198+ 6FC4                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 199+ 6FC4 7A           BAequDEdivC:            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 200+ 6FC5 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 201+ 6FC6 28 2A                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 202+ 6FC8 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; Fast exit is divide by 0
 203+ 6FC9 A7                                   and     a                       ;
 204+ 6FCA 28 29                                jr      z,.ResultIsFFFF         ;
 205+ 6FCC 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 206+ 6FCD A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 207+ 6FCE E6 80                                and     $80
 208+ 6FD0 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 209+ 6FD1 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 210+ 6FD3 06 10                                ld      b,16
 211+ 6FD5                                      ShiftDELeft1
 211+ 6FD5 CB 23       >			   sla e
 211+ 6FD7 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 212+ 6FD9 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 213+ 6FDB CB 39                                srl     c
 214+ 6FDD CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 215+ 6FDF                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 215+ 6FDF B9          >                        cp      c
 215+ 6FE0 DA E6 6F    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 216+ 6FE3                                      ClearCarryFlag
 216+ 6FE3 B7          >                        or a
 217+ 6FE4 99                                   sbc     c
 218+ 6FE5                                      ClearCarryFlag
 218+ 6FE5 B7          >                        or a
 219+ 6FE6 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 220+ 6FE7 CB 13                                rl      e
 221+ 6FE9 CB 12                                rl      d
 222+ 6FEB 05                                   dec     b
 223+ 6FEC 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 224+ 6FEE 7B                                   ld      a,e
 225+ 6FEF B5                                   or      l
 226+ 6FF0 42                                   ld      b,d
 227+ 6FF1 C9                                   ret
 228+ 6FF2              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 228+ 6FF2 AF          >                        xor a
 229+ 6FF3 47                                   ld      b,a
 230+ 6FF4 C9                                   ret
 231+ 6FF5 3E FF        .ResultIsFFFF:          ld      a,$FF
 232+ 6FF7 47                                   ld      b,a
 233+ 6FF8 C9                                   ret
 234+ 6FF9
 235+ 6FF9 57           DIV96:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 236+ 6FFA 3A 73 67                             ld      a,(varQ)
 237+ 6FFD 0E 60                                ld      c,96                    ; C = var Q
 238+ 6FFF 3A 73 66                             ld      a,(varP)
 239+ 7002 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 240+ 7003                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 241+ 7003 7A           BAequDEdiv96            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 242+ 7004 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 243+ 7005 28 26                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 244+ 7007 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 245+ 7008 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 246+ 7009 E6 80                                and     $80
 247+ 700B 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 248+ 700C 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 249+ 700E 06 10                                ld      b,16
 250+ 7010                                      ShiftDELeft1
 250+ 7010 CB 23       >			   sla e
 250+ 7012 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 251+ 7014 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 252+ 7016 CB 39                                srl     c
 253+ 7018 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 254+ 701A                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 254+ 701A B9          >                        cp      c
 254+ 701B DA 21 70    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 255+ 701E                                      ClearCarryFlag
 255+ 701E B7          >                        or a
 256+ 701F 99                                   sbc     c
 257+ 7020                                      ClearCarryFlag
 257+ 7020 B7          >                        or a
 258+ 7021 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 259+ 7022 CB 13                                rl      e
 260+ 7024 CB 12                                rl      d
 261+ 7026 05                                   dec     b
 262+ 7027 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 263+ 7029 7B                                   ld      a,e
 264+ 702A B5                                   or      l
 265+ 702B 42                                   ld      b,d
 266+ 702C C9                                   ret
 267+ 702D              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 267+ 702D AF          >                        xor a
 268+ 702E 47                                   ld      b,a
 269+ 702F C9                                   ret
 270+ 7030
 271+ 7030 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
 272+ 7031 15                                   dec     d
 273+ 7032 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
 274+ 7034 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
 275+ 7036 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 276+ 7038 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
 277+ 7039 B3                                   or      e
 278+ 703A 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
 279+ 703C 14                                   inc     d
 280+ 703D 15                                   dec     d
 281+ 703E CD 90 71                             call    BC_Div_DE
 282+ 7041                                      ZeroA
 282+ 7041 AF          >                        xor a
 283+ 7042 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
 284+ 7043 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
 285+ 7045 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
 286+ 7046 C9                                   ret
 287+ 7047 AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
 288+ 7048 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
 289+ 7049 67                                   ld      h,a
 290+ 704A 6F                                   ld      l,a
 291+ 704B C9                                   ret
 292+ 704C 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 293+ 704E 67                                   ld      h,a
 294+ 704F 6F                                   ld      l,a
 295+ 7050                                      SetCarryFlag
 295+ 7050 37          >                        scf
 296+ 7051 C9                                   ret
 297+ 7052
 298+ 7052              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
 299+ 7052                          IFDEF HLEquAmul256DivD_Used
 300+ 7052 ~            HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
 301+ 7052 ~                                    sla		a							;
 302+ 7052 ~                                    ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
 303+ 7052 ~            .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
 304+ 7052 ~                                    jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
 305+ 7052 ~                                    cp      d                           ; what was var Q
 306+ 7052 ~                                    jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
 307+ 7052 ~            .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
 308+ 7052 ~                                    sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
 309+ 7052 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
 310+ 7052 ~            .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
 311+ 7052 ~                                    rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
 312+ 7052 ~                                    djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
 313+ 7052 ~            .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
 314+ 7052 ~                                    jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
 315+ 7052 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
 316+ 7052 ~            .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
 317+ 7052 ~                                    ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
 318+ 7052 ~            .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
 319+ 7052 ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
 320+ 7052 ~                                    cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
 321+ 7052 ~                                    jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
 322+ 7052 ~                                    sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
 323+ 7052 ~            .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
 324+ 7052 ~                                    rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
 325+ 7052 ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
 326+ 7052 ~                                    ret
 327+ 7052 ~            .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
 328+ 7052 ~                                    SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
 329+ 7052 ~                                    rl      l                           ;
 330+ 7052 ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
 331+ 7052 ~                                    ret
 332+ 7052 ~            .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
 333+ 7052 ~                                    ret
 334+ 7052                          ENDIF
 335+ 7052
 336+ 7052 BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
 337+ 7053 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
 338+ 7055 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
 339+ 7057 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
 340+ 7059 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
 341+ 705B 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
 342+ 705D                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
 342+ 705D BA          >                        cp      d
 342+ 705E DA 63 70    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
 343+ 7061 92                                   sub     d
 344+ 7062                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
 344+ 7062 B7          >                        or a
 345+ 7063              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
 345+ 7063 3F          >                        ccf
 346+ 7064 CB 13                                rl      e
 347+ 7066 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
 348+ 7068 7B                                   ld      a,e
 349+ 7069 C9                                   ret
 350+ 706A 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 351+ 706B                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 351+ 706B 37          >                        scf
 352+ 706C CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 353+ 706E 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 354+ 7070 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 355+ 7071 C9                                   ret
 356+ 7072 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 357+ 7074 C9                                   ret
 358+ 7075 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 359+ 7077 C9                                   ret
 360+ 7078
 361+ 7078              ; Divide 8-bit values
 362+ 7078              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 363+ 7078              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 364+ 7078              ;
 365+ 7078              ;;;Div8:
 366+ 7078              ;;;    xor a
 367+ 7078              ;;;    ld b,8
 368+ 7078              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 369+ 7078              ;;;    rl e
 370+ 7078              ;;;    rla
 371+ 7078              ;;;    sub c
 372+ 7078              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 373+ 7078              ;;;    add a,c
 374+ 7078              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 375+ 7078              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 376+ 7078              ;;;    ld b,a0
 377+ 7078              ;;;    ld a,e
 378+ 7078              ;;;    rla
 379+ 7078              ;;;    cpl
 380+ 7078              ;;;    ret
 381+ 7078
 382+ 7078              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 383+ 7078              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 384+ 7078              ;;         A is a copy of E
 385+ 7078              ;;         HL is the remainder
 386+ 7078              ;;         BC is not changed
 387+ 7078              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 388+ 7078              ;140 bytes
 389+ 7078              ;145cc
 390+ 7078
 391+ 7078              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 392+ 7078 ~                                rla
 393+ 7078 ~                                adc     hl,hl
 394+ 7078 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 395+ 7078 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 396+ 7078 ~                                add     hl,bc
 397+ 7078                                  ENDM
 398+ 7078

 400+ 7079 ED 62                            sbc hl,hl
 401+ 707B 7A                               ld a,d

 402+ 7083 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 427+ 7104              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 428+ 7104              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 429+ 7104              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 430+ 7104              ; Our use
 431+ 7104              ; BC = A0
 432+ 7104              ; DE = 0C
 433+ 7104              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 434+ 7104              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 434+ 7104 B9          >                        cp     c
 434+ 7105 D2 30 71    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 435+ 7108 47                                   ld      b,a
 436+ 7109 59                                   ld      e,c
 437+ 710A 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 438+ 710C 16 00                                ld      d,0
 439+ 710E C3 1B 71                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 440+ 7111 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 441+ 7112 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 442+ 7114 21 73 67                             ld      hl,varQ
 443+ 7117 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 444+ 7118 16 00                                ld      d,0
 445+ 711A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 446+ 711B              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 447+ 711B 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 448+ 711E 78                                   ld      a,b
 449+ 711F 06 10                                ld      b,16
 450+ 7121 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 451+ 7123 17                                   rla			; ...
 452+ 7124 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 453+ 7126 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 454+ 7128 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 455+ 712A 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 456+ 712B 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 457+ 712C 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 458+ 712E 47                                   ld   b,a
 459+ 712F C9                                   ret
 460+ 7130 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 461+ 7133 C9                                   ret
 462+ 7134              ; switch to logarithm version
 463+ 7134              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 464+ 7134 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 465+ 7136 AF                                   xor a
 466+ 7137 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 467+ 7139 17                                   rla
 468+ 713A BA                                   cp d
 469+ 713B 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 469+ 713D
 470+ 713D 0C                                   inc c
 471+ 713E 92                                   sub d
 472+ 713F 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 473+ 7141 C9                                   ret
 474+ 7142              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 475+ 7142 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 476+ 7144 AF                                   xor a
 477+ 7145 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 478+ 7147 CB 14                                rl	h
 479+ 7149              ;    add hl,hl
 480+ 7149 17                                   rla
 481+ 714A B9                                   cp c
 482+ 714B 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 483+ 714D 2C                                   inc l
 484+ 714E 91                                   sub c
 485+ 714F 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 486+ 7151 C9                                   ret
 487+ 7152              ;
 488+ 7152              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 489+ 7152              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 490+ 7152              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 491+ 7152              ;
 492+ 7152              HLDivC_Iteration: 	    MACRO
 493+ 7152 ~                                    add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 494+ 7152 ~                                    rla				; ...
 495+ 7152 ~                                    cp	c			; ...
 496+ 7152 ~                                    jr	1F
 497+ 7152 ~                                    sub	c			; ...
 498+ 7152 ~            1:
 499+ 7152 ~                                    inc	l			; ...
 500+ 7152                                      ENDM
 501+ 7152
 502+ 7152              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 503+ 7152 ~                                    rl  e
 504+ 7152 ~                                    rla
 505+ 7152 ~                                    sub c
 506+ 7152 ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 507+ 7152 ~                                    add a,c
 508+ 7152 ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 509+ 7152                                      ENDM

 513+ 7152              E_Div_C:                ZeroA

 527+ 7190
 528+ 7190
 529+ 7190              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 530+ 7190 ~                                    rla
 531+ 7190 ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 532+ 7190 ~                                    add	    hl,de
 533+ 7190 ~                                    jr	    c,1F
 534+ 7190 ~                                    sbc	    hl,de
 535+ 7190 ~            1:
 536+ 7190                                      ENDM
 537+ 7190
 538+ 7190
 539+ 7190              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 540+ 7190              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 541+ 7190              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 542+ 7190              ;min: 738cc
 543+ 7190              ;max: 898cc
 544+ 7190              ;avg: 818cc
 545+ 7190              ;144 bytes
 546+ 7190 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 547+ 7191 67                                   ld h,a
 548+ 7192 6F                                   ld l,a
 549+ 7193 93                                   sub e
 550+ 7194 5F                                   ld e,a
 551+ 7195 9F                                   sbc a,a
 552+ 7196 92                                   sub d
 553+ 7197 57                                   ld d,a

 577+ 721F              ; BC = BC / DE
 578+ 721F              ; HL = BC % DE
 579+ 721F              ; if HL > 0 BC -= 1
 580+ 721F 7A           Floor_DivQ:             ld      a,d
 581+ 7220 B3                                   or      e
 582+ 7221 28 22                                jr      z, .divideBy0
 583+ 7223 D5                                   push    de
 584+ 7224 CD 90 71     .DoDivide:              call    BC_Div_DE       ; bc(q0) = bc / de , hl(r0) = bc %de
 585+ 7227 D1                                   pop     de              ; get divisor back to test
 586+ 7228 CB 7A                                bit     7,d             ; if divisor <0 or = 0 goto else branch
 587+ 722A C2 3A 72                             jp      nz,.deLTE0
 588+ 722D 7A                                   ld      a,d
 589+ 722E B3                                   or      e
 590+ 722F CA 3A 72                             jp      z,.deLTE0
 591+ 7232 CB 7C        .deGT0:                 bit     7,h             ; if remainder >=0 return with no adjustment
 592+ 7234 C8                                   ret     z               ; if remainder was not negative then all done
 593+ 7235 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 594+ 7236                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 594+ 7236 B7          >                        or a
 595+ 7237 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 596+ 7239 C9                                   ret
 597+ 723A CB 7C        .deLTE0:                bit     7,h             ; if remainder <= 0 retun with no adjustment
 598+ 723C C8                                   ret     z               ; (return if negative)
 599+ 723D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 600+ 723E B5                                   or      l               ; (return if zero)
 601+ 723F C8                                   ret     z
 602+ 7240 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 603+ 7241                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 603+ 7241 B7          >                        or a
 604+ 7242 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 605+ 7244 C9                                   ret

 613+ 724C              L_DIV_0_ITERATION:      MACRO
 614+ 724C ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 615+ 724C ~                                    ex      de,hl
 616+ 724C ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 617+ 724C ~                                    ex      de,hl
 618+ 724C ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 619+ 724C ~                                    jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 620+ 724C ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 621+ 724C ~            .skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 622+ 724C ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 623+ 724C ~                                    ex      de,hl
 624+ 724C ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry

 626+ 724C ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 627+ 724C ~                                    jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 628+ 724C ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 629+ 724C ~            .skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 630+ 724C                                      ENDM

 647+ 7375
 648+ 7375 11 FE FF     LLHLdivC:               ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 649+ 7378              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 649+ 7378 CB 25       >			   sla l
 649+ 737A CB 14       >			   rl  h
 650+ 737C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 651+ 737D 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 652+ 737F                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 652+ 737F B9          >                        cp      c
 652+ 7380 DA 8B 73    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 653+ 7383 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 654+ 7384 99                                   sbc     a,c                         ; q
 655+ 7385 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 656+ 7386 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 657+ 7387 DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 658+ 7389 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 659+ 738A 3F                                   ccf
 660+ 738B              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 660+ 738B CB 13       >               rl  e
 660+ 738D CB 12       >               rl  d
 661+ 738F 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 662+ 7391 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = result
 663+ 7392 C9                                   ret

 665+ 7393
 666+ 7393 AF           div_hl_c:               xor	a
 667+ 7394 06 10                                ld	b, 16
 668+ 7396 29           .loop:                  add	hl, hl
 669+ 7397 17                                   rla
 670+ 7398 38 03                                jr	c, $+5
 671+ 739A B9                                   cp	c
 672+ 739B 38 02                                jr	c, $+4
 673+ 739D 91                                   sub	c
 674+ 739E 2C                                   inc	l
 675+ 739F 10 F5                                djnz	.loop
 676+ 73A1 C9                                   ret
 677+ 73A2              ;l_div, signed division
 678+ 73A2              ; comes in with DE and HL
 679+ 73A2              ; HL = DE / HL, DE = DE % HL
 680+ 73A2 4A           l_div:                  ld      c,d             ;sign of dividend
 681+ 73A3 44                                   ld      b,h             ;sign of divisor
 682+ 73A4 C5                                   push    bc              ;save signs
 683+ 73A5 4D                                   ld      c,l             ;divisor to bc
 684+ 73A6 7A                                   ld      a,d
 685+ 73A7 B7                                   or      a
 686+ 73A8 F2 B1 73                             jp      p,.NotDENeg
 687+ 73AB              .DeNegate:              macronegate16de
 687+ 73AB AF          >					xor 	a
 687+ 73AC 93          >                    sub 	e
 687+ 73AD 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 687+ 73AE 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 687+ 73AF 92          >                    sub 	d
 687+ 73B0 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 688+ 73B1 78           .NotDENeg:              ld      a,b
 689+ 73B2 B7                                   or      a
 690+ 73B3 F2 BC 73                             jp      p,.NotBCNeg     ; if signs are opposite them flip
 691+ 73B6                                      macronegate16bc
 691+ 73B6 AF          >					xor 	a
 691+ 73B7 91          >                    sub 	c
 691+ 73B8 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
 691+ 73B9 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 691+ 73BA 90          >                    sub 	b
 691+ 73BB 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 692+ 73BC CD 4C 72     .NotBCNeg:              call    l_div_0         ;unsigned HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 693+ 73BF                                      ; C standard requires that the result of division satisfy a = (a/b)*b + a%b emainder takes sign of the dividend
 694+ 73BF C1                                   pop     bc              ;restore sign info
 695+ 73C0 78                                   ld      a,b
 696+ 73C1 A9                                   xor     c               ;quotient, sign of dividend^divisor
 697+ 73C2 F2 CB 73                             jp      p,.NotHLNeg
 698+ 73C5                                      macronegate16hl
 698+ 73C5 AF          >					xor 	a
 698+ 73C6 95          >					sub 	l
 698+ 73C7 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 698+ 73C8 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 698+ 73C9 94          >					sub 	h
 698+ 73CA 67          >					ld 		h,a
 699+ 73CB 79           .NotHLNeg:              ld      a,c
 700+ 73CC B7                                   or      a,a             ;remainder, sign of dividend
 701+ 73CD F0                                   ret     p
 702+ 73CE                                      macronegate16de
 702+ 73CE AF          >					xor 	a
 702+ 73CF 93          >                    sub 	e
 702+ 73D0 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 702+ 73D1 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 702+ 73D2 92          >                    sub 	d
 702+ 73D3 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 703+ 73D4 C9                                   ret
