 495  73D5                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ 73D5              asm_tis2:
   2+ 73D5              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 73D5              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 73D5 F5           	push af
   5+ 73D6 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 73D8 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 73D9 3A 73 67     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 73DC 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 73DD 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 73DE BB           	cp e
  11+ 73DF 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 73E1 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 73E3 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 73E5 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 73E6 3A 73 67     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 73E9 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 73EA CD 42 71     	call asm_div16
  18+ 73ED F1           	pop af
  19+ 73EE E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 73F0 B5           	or l
  21+ 73F1 C9           	ret
  22+ 73F2              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 73F2 F1           	pop af
  24+ 73F3 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 73F5 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 73F7 C9           	ret
  27+ 73F8
  28+ 73F8
  29+ 73F8              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ 73F8              squareregfx:
  31+ 73F8 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ 73FB 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 73FC 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 73FD ED 30        	mul
  35+ 73FF EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ 7400              squareregfy:
  37+ 7400 3A A8 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ 7403 57           	ld d,a
  39+ 7404 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 7405 ED 30        	mul
  41+ 7407 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 7408              squareregfz:
  43+ 7408 3A AA C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ 740B 57           	ld d,a
  45+ 740C 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 740D ED 30        	mul
  47+ 740F 19           	add hl,de
  48+ 7410 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 7411              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 7411 CD B9 6D     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 7414 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 7415 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 7416 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 7417              normfx:
  55+ 7417 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 741A E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 741B 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 741C 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 741D CD D5 73     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 7420 32 A6 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 7423              normfy:
  62+ 7423 3A A8 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 7426 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 7427 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 7428 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 7429 CD D5 73     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 742C 32 A8 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 742F              normfz:
  69+ 742F 3A AA C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 7432 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 7433 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 7434 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 7435 CD D5 73     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 7438 32 AA C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 743B              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 743B C9           	ret
  77+ 743C
# file closed: ../../Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 496  743C                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 743C              ; Input:
   2+ 743C              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 743C              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 743C              ; Output:
   5+ 743C              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 743C              ;
   7+ 743C              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 743C              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 743C              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 743C              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 743C              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 743C              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 743C              ;
  14+ 743C
  15+ 743C
  16+ 743C E5           CompareBCDESigned:  push    hl
  17+ 743D A7                               and     a
  18+ 743E 60 69                            ld      hl,bc
  19+ 7440 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  20+ 7442 E1                               pop     hl
  21+ 7443 C9                               ret
  22+ 7444
  23+ 7444 E5           CompareDEBCSigned:  push    hl
  24+ 7445 A7                               and     a
  25+ 7446 62 6B                            ld      hl,de
  26+ 7448 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  27+ 744A E1                               pop     hl
  28+ 744B C9                               ret
  29+ 744C
  30+ 744C
  31+ 744C              ;### CMPGTE -> test if A>=B
  32+ 744C              ;### Input      HL=A, DE=B if hl=> de no carry else de > hl and set carry
  33+ 744C 7C           CompareHLDESgn:     ld a,h
  34+ 744D AA                               xor d
  35+ 744E FA 58 74                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  36+ 7451 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
  37+ 7453 30 09                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  38+ 7455 19           .cmpgte1            add hl,de
  39+ 7456                                  SetCarryFlag
  39+ 7456 37          >                        scf
  40+ 7457 C9                               ret
  41+ 7458 CB 7A        .cmpgte2            bit 7,d
  42+ 745A 28 05                            jr z,.cmpgte4
  43+ 745C              .cmpgte5:           ClearCarryFlag
  43+ 745C B7          >                        or a
  44+ 745D C9                               ret
  45+ 745E 19           .cmpgte3            add hl,de
  46+ 745F                                  ClearCarryFlag
  46+ 745F B7          >                        or a
  47+ 7460 C9                               ret
  48+ 7461              .cmpgte4:           SetCarryFlag
  48+ 7461 37          >                        scf
  49+ 7462 C9                               ret
  50+ 7463
  51+ 7463              ; Compares HL and DE sets z flag if same, else nz
  52+ 7463 7C           CompareHLDESame:    ld  a,h
  53+ 7464 BA                               cp  d
  54+ 7465 C0                               ret nz
  55+ 7466 7D                               ld  a,l
  56+ 7467 BB                               cp  e
  57+ 7468 C9                               ret
  58+ 7469
  59+ 7469
  60+ 7469
  61+ 7469 7C           CompareHLBCSgn:     ld a,h
  62+ 746A A8                               xor b
  63+ 746B FA 74 74                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  64+ 746E ED 42                            sbc hl,bc
  65+ 7470 30 06                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  66+ 7472              .cmpgte1            SetCarryFlag
  66+ 7472 37          >                        scf
  67+ 7473 C9                               ret
  68+ 7474 CB 78        .cmpgte2            bit 7,b
  69+ 7476 28 FA                            jr z,.cmpgte1
  70+ 7478              .cmpgte3            ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 7478 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 7479 C9                               ret
  72+ 747A
  73+ 747A              CompareHLDESigned:
  74+ 747A E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  75+ 747B A7                               and     a
  76+ 747C ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  77+ 747E E1                               pop     hl
  78+ 747F C9                               ret
  79+ 7480              CompareHLBCSigned:
  80+ 7480 E5           CompareHLBC:        push    hl
  81+ 7481 A7                               and     a
  82+ 7482 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  83+ 7484 E1                               pop     hl
  84+ 7485 C9                               ret
  85+ 7486
  86+ 7486              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  87+ 7486              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  88+ 7486
  89+ 7486 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  90+ 7488 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  91+ 7489 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  92+ 748B 67                               ld      h,a
  93+ 748C 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  94+ 748D E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  95+ 748F 57                               ld      d,a
  96+ 7490 A7                               and     a
  97+ 7491 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  98+ 7493 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  99+ 7495 C9                               ret
 100+ 7496
 101+ 7496
# file closed: ../../Maths/compare16.asm
 497  7496                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 7496              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 7496
   3+ 7496 DD 7E 01     NormaliseIXVector:      ld		a,(ix+1)			; Vector X high
   4+ 7499 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = abs X high
   5+ 749B 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; hl = abs X ^ 2
   6+ 749C 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
   7+ 749D ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
   8+ 749F EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
   9+ 74A0 DD 7E 03                             ld		a,(ix+3)			; vector = Y high
  10+ 74A3 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  11+ 74A5 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; de = abs Y ^ 2
  12+ 74A6 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  13+ 74A7 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
  14+ 74A9 19                                   add     hl,de               ; hl = x^2 + y ^2
  15+ 74AA DD 7E 05                             ld		a,(ix+5)			; vector = Z high
  16+ 74AD E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  17+ 74AF 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; de = abs Z ^ 2
  18+ 74B0 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  19+ 74B1 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
  20+ 74B3 19                                   add     hl,de               ; de = x^2 + y ^2 + z ^ 2
  21+ 74B4 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  22+ 74B5 CD B9 6D     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt de
  23+ 74B8 DD 7E 01     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(ix+1)
  24+ 74BB 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  25+ 74BC CD 06 77                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  26+ 74BF 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  27+ 74C0 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  28+ 74C2 DD 71 00 DD                          ld		(ix+0),bc           ; .
  28+ 74C6 70 01
  29+ 74C8 DD 7E 03     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(ix+3)
  30+ 74CB 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  31+ 74CC CD 06 77                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  32+ 74CF 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  33+ 74D0 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  34+ 74D2 DD 71 02 DD                          ld		(ix+2),bc           ; .
  34+ 74D6 70 03
  35+ 74D8 DD 7E 05     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(ix+5)
  36+ 74DB 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  37+ 74DC CD 06 77                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  38+ 74DF 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  39+ 74E0 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  40+ 74E2 DD 71 04 DD                          ld		(ix+4),bc           ; .
  40+ 74E6 70 05
  41+ 74E8 C9                                   ret
  42+ 74E9
  43+ 74E9
  44+ 74E9 DD 7E 00     NormaliseIXVectorOld:      ld		a,(ix+0)	        ; XX15+0
  45+ 74EC E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
  46+ 74EE              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  46+ 74EE 5F          >			ld	e,a
  46+ 74EF 57          >			ld  d,a
  46+ 74F0 ED 30       >			mul
  47+ 74F2 62 6B                                ld		hl,de		 		; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  48+ 74F4 DD 7E 01     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(ix+1)
  49+ 74F7 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; = abs
  50+ 74F9                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  50+ 74F9 5F          >			ld	e,a
  50+ 74FA 57          >			ld  d,a
  50+ 74FB ED 30       >			mul
  51+ 74FD 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  52+ 74FE DD 7E 02     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(ix+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  53+ 7501 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  54+ 7503                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  54+ 7503 5F          >			ld	e,a
  54+ 7504 57          >			ld  d,a
  54+ 7505 ED 30       >			mul
  55+ 7507 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  56+ 7508 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  57+ 7509 CD B9 6D     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  58+ 750C DD 7E 00     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(ix+0)
  59+ 750F 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  60+ 7510 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  61+ 7512 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  62+ 7513 CD 06 77                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  63+ 7516 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  64+ 7517 79                                   ld      a,c
  65+ 7518 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  66+ 751A B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  67+ 751B DD 77 00                             ld		(ix+0),a
  68+ 751E DD 7E 01     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(ix+1)
  69+ 7521 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  70+ 7522 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  71+ 7524 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  72+ 7525 CD 06 77                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  73+ 7528 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  74+ 7529 79                                   ld      a,c
  75+ 752A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  76+ 752C B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  77+ 752D DD 77 01                             ld		(ix+1),a
  78+ 7530 DD 7E 02     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(ix+2)
  79+ 7533 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  80+ 7534 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  81+ 7536 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  82+ 7537 CD 06 77                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  83+ 753A 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  84+ 753B 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ 753C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  86+ 753E B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  87+ 753F DD 77 02                             ld		(ix+2),a
  88+ 7542 C9                                   ret
  89+ 7543
  90+ 7543              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  91+ 7543 3A A6 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
  92+ 7546 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  93+ 7548 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
  94+ 754A              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  94+ 754A 5F          >			ld	e,a
  94+ 754B 57          >			ld  d,a
  94+ 754C ED 30       >			mul
  95+ 754E 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  96+ 754F 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  97+ 7550 3A A7 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  98+ 7553 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  99+ 7555 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
 100+ 7557                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
 100+ 7557 5F          >			ld	e,a
 100+ 7558 57          >			ld  d,a
 100+ 7559 ED 30       >			mul
 101+ 755B 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
 102+ 755C 3A A8 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 103+ 755F FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
 104+ 7561 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
 105+ 7563                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
 105+ 7563 5F          >			ld	e,a
 105+ 7564 57          >			ld  d,a
 105+ 7565 ED 30       >			mul
 106+ 7567 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
 107+ 7568 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
 108+ 7569 CD B9 6D     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
 109+ 756C 3A A6 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
 110+ 756F E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
 111+ 7571 4F                                   ld		c,a
 112+ 7572 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
 113+ 7573 CD 06 77                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
 114+ 7576 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
 115+ 7577 DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
 116+ 7579 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
 117+ 757B B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
 118+ 757C 32 A6 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
 119+ 757F 3A A7 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
 120+ 7582 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
 121+ 7584 4F                                   ld		c,a
 122+ 7585 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
 123+ 7586 CD 06 77                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
 124+ 7589 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
 125+ 758A DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
 126+ 758C E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
 127+ 758E B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
 128+ 758F 32 A7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
 129+ 7592 3A A8 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
 130+ 7595 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
 131+ 7597 4F                                   ld		c,a
 132+ 7598 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
 133+ 7599 CD 06 77                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
 134+ 759C 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
 135+ 759D FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
 136+ 759F E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
 137+ 75A1 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
 138+ 75A2 32 A8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
 139+ 75A5 C9                                   ret
 140+ 75A6
 141+ 75A6              ; Normalise vector
 142+ 75A6              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
 143+ 75A6              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
 144+ 75A6              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
 145+ 75A6              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
 146+ 75A6
# file closed: ../../Maths/normalise96.asm
 498  75A6                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 75A6              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 75A6              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 75A6              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 75A6              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 75A6              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 75A6              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 75A6              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 75A6 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 75A9 CD BF 75     	call	Num1
  10+ 75AC 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 75AF CD BF 75     	call	Num1
  12+ 75B2 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 75B5 CD BF 75     	call	Num1
  14+ 75B8 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 75BA CD BF 75     	call	Num1
  16+ 75BD 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 75BF              Num1:
  18+ 75BF 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 75C1              .Num2:
  20+ 75C1 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 75C2 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 75C3 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 75C5 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 75C7 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 75C8 13           	inc	de
  26+ 75C9 C9           	ret
  27+ 75CA
  28+ 75CA              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 75CA 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 75CC 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 75CD C3 A6 75     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 75D0
  33+ 75D0              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 75D0 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 75D2 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 75D3 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 75D6 CD E6 75     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 75D9 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 75DB CD BF 75     	call	Num1
  40+ 75DE 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 75E0                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  optimise "
  42+ 75E0 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  43+ 75E1 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  44+ 75E2 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  45+ 75E4 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  46+ 75E6              .NumLeadBlank1:
  47+ 75E6 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  48+ 75E8              .NumLeadBlank2:
  49+ 75E8 3C           	inc	a
  50+ 75E9 09           	add	hl,bc
  51+ 75EA 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  52+ 75EC FE 30        	cp	'0'
  53+ 75EE 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  54+ 75F0              .Blank:
  55+ 75F0 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  56+ 75F2              .DontBlank:
  57+ 75F2 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  58+ 75F4 12           	ld	(de),a
  59+ 75F5 13           	inc	de
  60+ 75F6 C9           	ret
  61+ 75F7
  62+ 75F7              DispQtyAtoDE:
  63+ 75F7 FE 00        	cp	0
  64+ 75F9 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  65+ 75FB 26 00        	ld h,0
  66+ 75FD 6F           	ld l,a
  67+ 75FE 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  68+ 7601 CD 0D 76     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  69+ 7604 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  70+ 7606 CD 0D 76     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  71+ 7609 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  72+ 760B 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  73+ 760D              .NumLeadBlank1:
  74+ 760D 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  75+ 760F              .NumLeadBlank2:
  76+ 760F 3C           	inc	a
  77+ 7610 09           	add	hl,bc
  78+ 7611 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  79+ 7613 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  80+ 7615 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  81+ 7617              .Blank:
  82+ 7617 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  83+ 7619              .DontBlank:
  84+ 7619 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  85+ 761B 12           	ld	(de),a
  86+ 761C 13           	inc	de
  87+ 761D C9           	ret
  88+ 761E              .NoStock:
  89+ 761E 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  90+ 7620 12           	ld	(de),a
  91+ 7621 13           	inc	de
  92+ 7622 12           	ld	(de),a
  93+ 7623 13           	inc	de
  94+ 7624 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  95+ 7626 12           	ld	(de),a
  96+ 7627 13           	inc de
  97+ 7628 C9           	ret
  98+ 7629
  99+ 7629

 101+ 7629              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address

 103+ 7629              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX

 127+ 7682 22 51 76                             ld (clcn32z),hl

 129+ 7688 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)

 143+ 76A9 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 144+ 76AC 2A 53 76                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)

 499  76D1                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm" ; AequAdivDmul96
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ 76D1              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 76D1 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 76D2 D2 ED 76    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 76D5 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 76D7 CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 76D9                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 76D9 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 76DA DA F0 76    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 76DD 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 76DE 37                                   scf
   7+ 76DF CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 76E1 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 76E3 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 76E4 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 76E6 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 76E8 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 76E9 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 76EB 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 76EC C9                                   ret
  16+ 76ED 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 76EF C9                                   ret
  18+ 76F0 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 76F1 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 76F3 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 76F5 C3 E3 76                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 76F8
  23+ 76F8
  24+ 76F8              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 76F8              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 76F8              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 76F8 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ 76FA 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 76FC ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 76FE CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ 7700              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 7700              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 7700              TIS2:
  34+ 7700 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 7701 3A 73 67     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 7704 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 7705 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 7706 4F           AequAdivDmul967Bit:     ld          c,a
  39+ 7707 7A                                   ld          a,d
  40+ 7708 CB 27                                sla         a       ; wipe sign bit
  41+ 770A C8                                   ret         z       ; quick exit if dividing 0 as a will have the result of 0
  42+ 770B 30 10                                jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 770D B7           .ScaleDown:             or          a       ; clear carry bit
  44+ 770E CB 3A                                srl         d       ; d >> 1 to get back to 7 bit value
  45+ 7710 79                                   ld          a,c
  46+ 7711 E6 7F                                and         SignMask8Bit
  47+ 7713 CB 3F                                srl         a
  48+ 7715 47                                   ld          b,a
  49+ 7716 79                                   ld          a,c
  50+ 7717 E6 80                                and         $80
  51+ 7719 B0                                   or          b
  52+ 771A C3 1E 77                             jp          AequAdivDmul96
  53+ 771D 79           .OKToDivide:            ld          a,c
  54+ 771E 4F           AequAdivDmul96:         ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  55+ 771F E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  56+ 7721                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  56+ 7721 BA          >                        cp     d
  56+ 7722 D2 42 77    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  57+ 7725 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  58+ 7727              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  59+ 7727 CB 27                                sla			a
  60+ 7729                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  60+ 7729 BA          >                        cp      d
  60+ 772A DA 48 77    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  61+ 772D 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  62+ 772E 37                                   scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  63+ 772F CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  64+ 7731 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  65+ 7733 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  66+ 7734 CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
  67+ 7736 CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
  68+ 7738 47                                   ld			b,a							; .
  69+ 7739 CB 3F                                srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  70+ 773B 80                                   add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  71+ 773C 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  72+ 773D 79                                   ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  73+ 773E E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  74+ 7740 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  75+ 7741 C9                                   ret
  76+ 7742              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  77+ 7742 79           .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,c
  78+ 7743 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  79+ 7745 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  80+ 7747 C9                                   ret
  81+ 7748              .TIS2SkipSub:           ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  81+ 7748 B7          >                        or a
  82+ 7749 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  83+ 774B 38 DA                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  84+ 774D C3 33 77                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  85+ 7750
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 500  7750                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ 7750              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 7750              fmltu:
   3+ 7750 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 7751 3A 73 67                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 7754 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 7755 ED 30                                mul
   7+ 7757 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 7758 C9                                   ret
   9+ 7759
  10+ 7759 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ 775A ED 30                                mul
  12+ 775C 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 775D C9                                   ret

 501  775E                  ;INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
 502  775E                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 775E              APequQmulA:
   2+ 775E              asm_mult1:
   3+ 775E              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 775E FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 7760 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 7762 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 7763 3A 73 67     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 7766 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 7767 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 7769 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 776B AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 776C E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 776E 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 776F 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 7770 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 7772 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 7773 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 7774 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 7776 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 7777 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 7779 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 777A 32 73 66     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 777D 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 777E B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 777F 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 7780 C9           	ret
  27+ 7781              .mul0:
  28+ 7781 AF           	xor	a
  29+ 7782 32 73 66     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 7785 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 7786 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 7787 C9           	ret
  33+ 7788
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 503  7788                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 7788              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 7788              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 7788              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 7788              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 7788              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 7788              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 7788              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 7788              LL38:
   9+ 7788              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 7788              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 7788              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 7788              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 7788              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 7788              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 7788              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 7788              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 7788              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 7788              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 7788              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 7788              ;	ret
  21+ 7788              ; calculation table
  22+ 7788              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 7788              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 7788              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 7788              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 7788              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 7788              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 7788              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 7788              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 7788              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 7788
  32+ 7788              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 7788              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 7788              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 7788              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 7788
  37+ 7788
  38+ 7788              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 7788 21 75 67     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 778B AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 778C FA 97 77     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 778F 3A 73 67     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 7792 21 74 67     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 7795 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 7796 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 7797              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 7797 3A 74 67     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 779A 21 73 67     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 779D              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 779D              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 779D B7          >                        or a
  51+ 779E 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 779F 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 77A1              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 77A1              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 77A1              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 77A1 C9           	ret
  57+ 77A2              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 77A2 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 77A4 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 77A6 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 77A8 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 77A9 3A 75 67     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 77AC EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 77AE 32 75 67     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 77B1 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 77B2                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 77B2 B7          >                        or a
  67+ 77B3 C9           	ret
  68+ 77B4              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 77B4 32 75 67         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 77B7                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 77B7 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 77B8 C9               ret
  72+ 77B9              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 77B9              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 77B9              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 77B9              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 77B9              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 77B9              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 77B9              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 77B9              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 77B9              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 77B9              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 77B9              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 77B9              ;--	ret
  84+ 77B9
  85+ 77B9              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 77B9              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 77B9              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 77B9              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 77B9              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 77B9              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 77B9              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 77B9              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 77B9              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 77B9              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 77B9              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 77B9              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 77B9              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 77B9              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 77B9              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 77B9              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 77B9              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 77B9              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 77B9              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 77B9              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 77B9              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 77B9              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 77B9              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 77B9              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 77B9              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 77B9              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 77B9              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 77B9              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 77B9              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 77B9              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 77B9              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 77B9              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 77B9              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 77B9              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 77B9              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 77B9              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 77B9              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 77B9              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 77B9              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 77B9              ;;;;	ret
 141+ 77B9
 142+ 77B9
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
 504  77B9                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ 77B9              ;;;LL28:
   2+ 77B9              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ 77B9              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ 77B9              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ 77B9              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ 77B9              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ 77B9              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ 77B9              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ 77B9              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ 77B9              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ 77B9              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ 77B9              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ 77B9              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ 77B9              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ 77B9              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ 77B9              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ 77B9              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ 77B9              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ 77B9              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ 77B9              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ 77B9              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ 77B9              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ 77B9              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ 77B9              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ 77B9              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ 77B9              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ 77B9              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ 77B9              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ 77B9              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ 77B9              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ 77B9              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ 77B9              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ 77B9              ;;;	ret
  34+ 77B9              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ 77B9              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ 77B9              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ 77B9              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ 77B9              ;;;	ret
  39+ 77B9
  40+ 77B9              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ 77B9 59             ld    e,c
  42+ 77BA 67             ld    h,a
  43+ 77BB 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ 77BD              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ 77BD 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ 77BE B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ 77BF C8             ret z
  48+ 77C0 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ 77C3 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ 77C5              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ 77C5 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ 77C7 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ 77C8 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ 77CA C9             ret
  55+ 77CB
  56+ 77CB              HL_Div_C:
  57+ 77CB              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ 77CB              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ 77CB              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ 77CB 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ 77CD AF                   xor a
  62+ 77CE              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ 77CE 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ 77CF 17                   rla
  65+ 77D0 B9                   cp c
  66+ 77D1 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ 77D3 91                   sub c
  68+ 77D4 2C                   inc l
  69+ 77D5              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ 77D5 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ 77D7 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ 77D8 32 74 67             ld  (varR),a
  73+ 77DB C9                   ret
  74+ 77DC
  75+ 77DC
  76+ 77DC
  77+ 77DC              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ 77DC              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ 77DC              BFRDIV:
  80+ 77DC F5           		push	af
  81+ 77DD 3A 73 67     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ 77E0 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ 77E1 F1           		pop		af
  84+ 77E2 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ 77E4 CA FB 77     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ 77E7              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ 77E7 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ 77E9 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ 77EA              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ 77EA 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ 77EC AF           		xor a
  92+ 77ED              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ 77ED 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ 77EE 17           		rla
  95+ 77EF B9           		cp c
  96+ 77F0 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ 77F2 2C           		inc l
  98+ 77F3 91           		sub c
  99+ 77F4              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ 77F4 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ 77F6 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ 77F7 32 74 67     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ 77FA C9           		ret
 104+ 77FB              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ 77FB 32 74 67     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ 77FE C9           		ret
 107+ 77FF              ;	push	af
 108+ 77FF              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ 77FF              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ 77FF              ;	pop		af
 111+ 77FF              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ 77FF              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ 77FF              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ 77FF              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ 77FF              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ 77FF              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ 77FF              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ 77FF              ;	sla		a
 119+ 77FF              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ 77FF              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ 77FF              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ 77FF              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ 77FF              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ 77FF              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ 77FF              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ 77FF              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ 77FF              ;	scf
 128+ 77FF              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ 77FF              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ 77FF              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ 77FF              ;LL2:
 132+ 77FF              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ 77FF              ;LL2Good:
 134+ 77FF              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ 77FF              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ 77FF              ;	ret
 137+ 77FF
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
 505  77FF                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ 77FF              RequAdivQ:
   2+ 77FF              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ 77FF              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ 77FF 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ 7800 3A 73 67     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ 7803 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ 7805 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ 7807 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ 7808 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ 780A AF               xor a
  11+ 780B              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ 780B CB 21            sla c
  13+ 780D 17               rla
  14+ 780E BA               cp d
  15+ 780F 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ 7811 0C               inc c
  17+ 7812 92               sub d
  18+ 7813              LL64:
  19+ 7813 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ 7815 32 72 67     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ 7818 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ 7819 32 74 67     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ 781C C9               ret
  24+ 781D              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ 781D 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ 781F 32 74 67     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ 7822 32 72 67     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ 7825 C9           	ret
  29+ 7826
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
 506  7826                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm"

   1+ 7826              asm_mult12:
   2+ 7826              RSequQmulA:
   3+ 7826              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ 7826 CD 5E 77     	call APequQmulA
   5+ 7829 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ 782A 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ 782B 32 75 67     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ 782E 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ 782F 32 74 67     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ 7832 08           	ex 	af,af'

   1+ 78C4              ;rotmap0xLo: DB	0				; INWK +9

  44+ 78C4              ;; orthonormalise vector for UBnK ship vector uses IX IT
  45+ 78C4              ;TidyVectorsIX:  ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)  ; hl = nosev_x * roofv_x
  46+ 78C4              ;                ld      d,a                     ; .
  47+ 78C4              ;                ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)  ; .

  51+ 78C4              ;                ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)  ; de = nosev_y * roofv_y
  52+ 78C4              ;                ld      d,a                     ; .
  53+ 78C4              ;                ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)  ; .

  57+ 78C4              ;                ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
  58+ 78C4              ;                cp      0
  59+ 78C4              ;                jp      nz,.CalcRoofZ

  61+ 78C4              ;                ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de
  62+ 78C4              ;                jp      .NormaliseStep
  63+ 78C4              ;.CalcRoofZ:
  64+ 78C4              ;
  65+ 78C4              ;
  66+ 78C4              ;                 roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
  67+ 78C4              ;                 Normalise roofv
  68+ 78C4              ;                 sidev_x = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
  69+ 78C4              ;                 sidev_y = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
  70+ 78C4              ;                 sidev_z = (nosev_y * roofv_x - nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
  71+ 78C4              ;                 Zero all the low bytes
  72+ 78C4              ;
  73+ 78C4              ; Divide that sets value to FFFF if divide by 0 unless main value is 0, then 0
  74+ 78C4
  75+ 78C4              ; (P+1 A) = (A P) / Q
  76+ 78C4              ;  B A    = (A P) / Q
  77+ 78C4              ; TESTED OK
  78+ 78C4
  79+ 78C4
  80+ 78C4 2A A6 C0     NormalizeXX15:          ld      hl, (XX15VecX)              ; h= VecX, l = VecY
  81+ 78C7 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,  (XX15VecZ)              ; a = VecZ, d we don't care
  82+ 78CA E6 7F        .ABSZ:                  and     SignMask8Bit
  83+ 78CC FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = abs z
  84+ 78CE 57           .ZSquared:              ld      d,a
  85+ 78CF 5F                                   ld      e,a
  86+ 78D0 ED 30                                mul     de
  87+ 78D2 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; bc = z squared
  88+ 78D4 7D           .ABSX:                  ld      a,l
  89+ 78D5 E6 7F        .XSquared:              and     SignMask8Bit
  90+ 78D7 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = abs x
  91+ 78D9 57                                   ld      d,a
  92+ 78DA 5F                                   ld      e,a
  93+ 78DB ED 30                                mul     de
  94+ 78DD EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = x squared
  95+ 78DE 7A           .ABSY:                  ld      a,d                         ; as h was swapped into d
  96+ 78DF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  97+ 78E1 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = abs y
  98+ 78E3 5F           .YSquared:              ld      e,a
  99+ 78E4 57                                   ld      d,a
 100+ 78E5 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; de = y squared
 101+ 78E7 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de + bc
 102+ 78E8 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ;
 103+ 78E9 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 104+ 78EA CD B9 6D                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; d = iyl =hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 105+ 78ED 55                                   ld      d,l
 106+ 78EE FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d
 107+ 78F0 DD 7C        .NormaliseX:            ld      a,ixh                       ; normalise x
 108+ 78F2 CD 06 77                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
 109+ 78F5 57                                   ld      d,a
 110+ 78F6 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecX)
 111+ 78F9 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 112+ 78FB B2                                   or      d
 113+ 78FC 32 A6 C0                             ld      (XX15VecX),a
 114+ 78FF DD 7D        .NormaliseY:            ld      a,ixl                       ; normalise y
 115+ 7901 55                                   ld      d,l
 116+ 7902 CD 06 77                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
 117+ 7905 57                                   ld      d,a
 118+ 7906 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecY)
 119+ 7909 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 120+ 790B B2                                   or      d
 121+ 790C 32 A7 C0                             ld      (XX15VecY),a
 122+ 790F FD 7C        .NormaliseZ:            ld      a,iyh                       ; normalise z
 123+ 7911 55                                   ld      d,l
 124+ 7912 CD 06 77                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
 125+ 7915 57                                   ld      d,a
 126+ 7916 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecZ)
 127+ 7919 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 128+ 791B B2                                   or      d
 129+ 791C 32 A8 C0                             ld      (XX15VecZ),a
 130+ 791F C9                                   ret
 131+ 7920
 132+ 7920              TidyNormaliseNoseV:     MACRO
 133+ 7920 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
 134+ 7920 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
 135+ 7920 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
 136+ 7920                                      ENDM
 137+ 7920              TidyNormaliseRoofV:     MACRO
 138+ 7920 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
 139+ 7920 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 140+ 7920 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 141+ 7920                                      ENDM
 142+ 7920
 143+ 7920
 144+ 7920              TidyUbnK:               ;break
 145+ 7920                                      TidyNormaliseNoseV
 145+ 7920 CD 34 78    >                        call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
 145+ 7923 CD C4 78    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
 145+ 7926 CD 6D 78    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
 146+ 7929 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Now check and see which vector elemetn we are going to
 147+ 792C E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if X is not small then we go straigth to roofx
 148+ 792E C2 C6 79                             jp      nz,.ProcessRoofX            ; .
 149+ 7931 3A 38 C0     .TidyXIsSmall:          ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; Else we test Y on to using
 150+ 7934 E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if Y is not small we process roofz
 151+ 7936 20 47                                jr      nz,.ProcessRoofZ            ; .
 152+ 7938              ;...roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 153+ 7938 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofY:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 154+ 793B 32 73 67                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 155+ 793E 3A 30 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 156+ 7941 CD 26 78                             call	RSequQmulA
 157+ 7944 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 158+ 7947 32 73 67                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 159+ 794A 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 160+ 794D CD F6 6B                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 161+ 7950 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 162+ 7951 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 163+ 7953 57                                   ld      d,a
 164+ 7954 3A 38 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 165+ 7957 32 73 67                             ld      (varQ),a
 166+ 795A 7A           .YTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 167+ 795B E6 7F                                and     $7F
 168+ 795D B3                                   or      e
 169+ 795E FE 00                                cp      0
 170+ 7960 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 171+ 7962                                      ZeroA
 171+ 7962 AF          >                        xor a
 172+ 7963 C3 C0 79                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 173+ 7966 FE 00        .YTestDiv0:             cp      0
 174+ 7968 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 175+ 796A 3E 60        .YDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 176+ 796C B2                                   or      d
 177+ 796D C3 C0 79                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 178+ 7970 7B           .SkipYZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 179+ 7971 32 73 66                             ld      (varP),a
 180+ 7974 7A                                   ld      a,d
 181+ 7975 CD BB 6F                             call    DVIDT
 182+ 7978 78                                   ld      a,b
 183+ 7979 32 32 C0     .SetRoofY:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a
 184+ 797C C3 0A 7A                             jp      .DoneRoof
 185+ 797F              ;...roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 186+ 797F 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofZ:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Failing that we default to Z
 187+ 7982 32 73 67                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; q = nosev_y
 188+ 7985 3A 30 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 189+ 7988 CD 26 78                             call	RSequQmulA
 190+ 798B 3A 38 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)	    ; nosev z
 191+ 798E 32 73 67                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; b = regX for now
 192+ 7991 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 193+ 7994 CD F6 6B                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 194+ 7997 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 195+ 7998 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 196+ 799A 57                                   ld      d,a
 197+ 799B 3A 3A C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 198+ 799E 32 73 67                             ld      (varQ),a
 199+ 79A1 7A           .ZTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 200+ 79A2 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 201+ 79A4 B3                                   or      e
 202+ 79A5 FE 00                                cp      0
 203+ 79A7 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 204+ 79A9                                      ZeroA
 204+ 79A9 AF          >                        xor a
 205+ 79AA C3 C0 79                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 206+ 79AD FE 00        .ZTestDiv0:             cp      0
 207+ 79AF 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 208+ 79B1 3E 60        .ZDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 209+ 79B3 B2                                   or      d
 210+ 79B4 C3 C0 79                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 211+ 79B7 7B           .SkipZZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 212+ 79B8 32 73 66                             ld      (varP),a
 213+ 79BB 7A                                   ld      a,d
 214+ 79BC CD BB 6F                             call    DVIDT
 215+ 79BF 78                                   ld      a,b
 216+ 79C0 32 34 C0     .SetRoofZ:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a
 217+ 79C3 C3 0A 7A                             jp      .DoneRoof
 218+ 79C6              ;...roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 219+ 79C6 3A 38 C0     .ProcessRoofX:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; so we set Q to Nose Y
 220+ 79C9 32 73 67                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y

 222+ 79CF CD 26 78                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; RS = NoseY & RoofY

 224+ 79D5 32 73 67                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 225+ 79D8 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 226+ 79DB CD F6 6B                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 227+ 79DE 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 228+ 79DF EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 229+ 79E1 57                                   ld      d,a
 230+ 79E2 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 231+ 79E5 32 73 67                             ld      (varQ),a
 232+ 79E8 7A           .XTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 233+ 79E9 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 234+ 79EB B3                                   or      e
 235+ 79EC FE 00                                cp      0
 236+ 79EE 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 237+ 79F0                                      ZeroA
 237+ 79F0 AF          >                        xor a
 238+ 79F1 C3 C0 79                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 239+ 79F4 FE 00        .XTestDiv0:             cp      0
 240+ 79F6 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest

 242+ 79FA B2                                   or      d
 243+ 79FB C3 07 7A                             jp      .SetRoofX
 244+ 79FE 7B           .SkipXZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 245+ 79FF 32 73 66                             ld      (varP),a
 246+ 7A02 7A                                   ld      a,d
 247+ 7A03 CD BB 6F                             call    DVIDT
 248+ 7A06 78                                   ld      a,b
 249+ 7A07 32 30 C0     .SetRoofX:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a
 250+ 7A0A              .DoneRoof:              TidyNormaliseRoofV
 250+ 7A0A CD 47 78    >                        call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
 250+ 7A0D CD C4 78    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 250+ 7A10 CD 8A 78    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 251+ 7A13              ;...sidex = ((nosez * roofy) - nosey * roofz) / 96
 252+ 7A13 3A 3A C0     .DoSidevX:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)      ;  -(-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 253+ 7A16 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 254+ 7A18 32 73 67                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 255+ 7A1B 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	     ;roov z
 256+ 7A1E CD 26 78                             call	RSequQmulA
 257+ 7A21 3A 38 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)		; nosev z
 258+ 7A24 32 73 67                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 259+ 7A27 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 260+ 7A2A CD F6 6B                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 261+ 7A2D CD 03 70                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 262+ 7A30 78                                   ld      a,b
 263+ 7A31 32 2A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 264+ 7A34              ;...sidey = ((nosex * roofz) - nosez * roofx) / 96
 265+ 7A34 3A 36 C0     .DoSidevY:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; -(-nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 266+ 7A37 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 267+ 7A39 32 73 67                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 268+ 7A3C 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roov z
 269+ 7A3F CD 26 78                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; rs = nosex * roofz
 270+ 7A42 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 271+ 7A45 32 73 67                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 272+ 7A48 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 273+ 7A4B CD F6 6B                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS          ; DE = noseyz* roofz +
 274+ 7A4E CD 03 70                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 275+ 7A51 78                                   ld      a,b
 276+ 7A52 32 2C C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a         ;-(-nosev_y * roofv_x + nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
 277+ 7A55              ;...sidez = ((nosey * roofx) - nosex * roofy) / 96
 278+ 7A55 3A 38 C0     .DoSidevZ:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ;
 279+ 7A58 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 280+ 7A5A 32 73 67                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 281+ 7A5D 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z

 288+ 7A72 78                                   ld      a,b

 290+ 7A76 AF          >                        xor a

 293+ 7A7D 32 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),a

 295+ 7A81
 296+ 7A81
 297+ 7A81              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
 298+ 7A81              		; b = regX on entry
 299+ 7A81              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
 300+ 7A81 08           		ex		af,af'
 301+ 7A82 78           		ld		a,b
 302+ 7A83 32 73 67     		ld		(varQ),a
 303+ 7A86 08           		ex		af,af'
 304+ 7A87 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
 305+ 7A89 CD D4 6B     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
 306+ 7A8C              ; USES 				A BC E
 307+ 7A8C              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
 308+ 7A8C              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
 309+ 7A8C 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
 310+ 7A8D E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
 311+ 7A8F 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
 312+ 7A90 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
 313+ 7A91 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
 314+ 7A93 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
 315+ 7A95              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
 316+ 7A95 CB 27        		sla		a
 317+ 7A97              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
 317+ 7A97 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
 317+ 7A99 DA A6 7A    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
 318+ 7A9C DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
 319+ 7A9E 37           		scf
 320+ 7A9F CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
 321+ 7AA1 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
 322+ 7AA3              TIS1KIPCont:
 323+ 7AA3 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
 324+ 7AA4 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
 325+ 7AA5 C9           		ret
 326+ 7AA6              TIS1SkipSub:
 327+ 7AA6 B7           	or			a
 328+ 7AA7 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 329+ 7AA9 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 330+ 7AAB C3 A3 7A     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
 331+ 7AAE
 332+ 7AAE              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
 333+ 7AAE              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz

 378+ 7AF1 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)

 381+ 7AFA CD 26 78     		call	RSequQmulA
 382+ 7AFD 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z

 385+ 7B04 CD 81 7A     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 386+ 7B07                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 386+ 7B07 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 386+ 7B08 CA 0D 7B    >                        jp	    z, NormSideXNoNeg
 387+ 7B0B EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 388+ 7B0D              NormSideXNoNeg:

 392+ 7B13 32 73 67     		ld		(varQ),a
