 717+ D260 FD 23                inc         iy
 718+ D262 FD 23                inc         iy
 719+ D264 C9                   ret
 720+ D265              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 721+ D265              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
 722+ D265              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
 723+ D265              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
 724+ D265              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
 725+ D265              CopyNodeToXX15:
 726+ D265                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
 726+ D265 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
 726+ D266 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
 727+ D269 23                   inc         hl
 728+ D26A                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
 728+ D26A 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
 728+ D26B 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
 729+ D26E 23                   inc         hl
 730+ D26F                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
 730+ D26F 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
 730+ D270 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
 731+ D273 23                   inc         hl
 732+ D274              PopulateXX15SignBits:
 733+ D274              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
 734+ D274 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
 735+ D275 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
 736+ D276 47                   ld          b,a
 737+ D277 E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
 738+ D279 32 A7 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
 739+ D27C 78                   ld          a,b
 740+ D27D E6 40                and         $40
 741+ D27F CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
 742+ D281 32 A9 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
 743+ D284 78                   ld          a,b
 744+ D285 E6 20                and         $20
 745+ D287 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
 746+ D289 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
 747+ D28B 32 AB C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
 748+ D28E 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
 749+ D28F E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
 750+ D291 32 8F 67             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
 751+ D294 C9                   ret
 752+ D295
 753+ D295              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
 754+ D295              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
 755+ D295              ;..............................................................................................................................
 756+ D295              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
 757+ D295              LL48GetScale:
 758+ D295 3A 64 66             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
 759+ D298 5F                   ld          e,a
 760+ D299 CD 65 D2             call        CopyNodeToXX15
 761+ D29C              LL48GetVertices:
 762+ D29C              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
 763+ D29C                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
 763+ D29C BB          >                        cp      e
 763+ D29D DA DA D2    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
 764+ D2A0              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
 765+ D2A0                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
 765+ D2A0 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
 765+ D2A1 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
 765+ D2A2 32 73 66    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
 766+ D2A5 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
 767+ D2A6 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
 768+ D2A8 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
 769+ D2A9                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
 769+ D2A9 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 769+ D2AC ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
 769+ D2AE 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
 770+ D2AF E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
 771+ D2B0                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
 771+ D2B0 A7          >                        and     a
 771+ D2B1 C2 E0 D2    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
 772+ D2B4              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
 773+ D2B4 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
 774+ D2B5 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
 775+ D2B7 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
 776+ D2B9                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
 776+ D2B9 A7          >                        and     a
 776+ D2BA C2 E0 D2    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
 777+ D2BD              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
 778+ D2BD                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
 778+ D2BD 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
 778+ D2BE 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
 778+ D2BF 32 73 66    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
 779+ D2C2 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
 780+ D2C3 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
 781+ D2C5 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
 782+ D2C6                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
 782+ D2C6 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 782+ D2C9 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
 782+ D2CB 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
 783+ D2CC E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
 784+ D2CD                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
 784+ D2CD A7          >                        and     a
 784+ D2CE C2 E0 D2    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
 785+ D2D1              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
 786+ D2D1 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
 787+ D2D2 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
 788+ D2D4 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
 789+ D2D6                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
 789+ D2D6 A7          >                        and     a
 789+ D2D7 C2 E0 D2    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
 790+ D2DA              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
 791+ D2DA 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
 792+ D2DD FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
 793+ D2DF                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
 794+ D2DF C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
 795+ D2E0              NodeIsVisible:
 796+ D2E0              LL49:
 797+ D2E0 CD 87 D1             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
 798+ D2E3 C9                   ret
 799+ D2E4
 800+ D2E4                  DISPLAY "Tracing 6", $
 801+ D2E4
 802+ D2E4              ProjectNodeToEye:
 803+ D2E4 ED 4B AA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
 804+ D2E8 79               ld          a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
 805+ D2E9 32 73 67         ld          (varQ),a                            ; VarQ = z
 806+ D2EC 3A A6 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo which is signed
 807+ D2EF CD 04 71         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
 808+ D2F2 3A A7 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 809+ D2F5                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 809+ D2F5 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 809+ D2F7 C2 02 D3    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
 810+ D2FA              EyePositiveXPoint:                                  ; x was positive result
 811+ D2FA 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX                     ;
 812+ D2FC 26 00            ld          h,0
 813+ D2FE 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre + X
 814+ D2FF C3 09 D3         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
 815+ D302              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 816+ D302 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 817+ D304 26 00            ld          h,0
 818+ D306                  ClearCarryFlag
 818+ D306 B7          >                        or a
 819+ D307 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 820+ D309              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 821+ D309 EB               ex          de,hl
 822+ D30A FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
 823+ D30D FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
 824+ D310              EyeProcessYPoint:
 825+ D310 ED 4B AA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; Now process Y co-ordinate
 826+ D314 79               ld          a,c
 827+ D315 32 73 67         ld          (varQ),a
 828+ D318 3A A8 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
 829+ D31B CD 04 71         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
 830+ D31E 3A A9 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 831+ D321                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 831+ D321 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 831+ D323 C2 2E D3    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
 832+ D326              EyePositiveYPoint:                                  ; Y is positive so above the centre line
 833+ D326 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 834+ D328                  ClearCarryFlag
 834+ D328 B7          >                        or a
 835+ D329 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 836+ D32B C3 33 D3         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
 837+ D32E              EyeNegativeYPoint:                                  ; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 838+ D32E 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 839+ D330 26 00            ld          h,0
 840+ D332 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 841+ D333              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 842+ D333 EB               ex          de,hl
 843+ D334 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
 844+ D337 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
 845+ D33A C9               ret
 846+ D33B              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 847+ D33B                          INCLUDE "../../Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D33B
   2++D33B              ; Full version
   3++D33B              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D33B              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D33B              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D33B              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D33B
   8++D33B
   9++D33B              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  10++D33B ~                                    push    bc
  11++D33B ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  12++D33B ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  13++D33B ~                                    ld      b,a
  14++D33B ~                                    ld      a,c
  15++D33B ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  16++D33B ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  17++D33B ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  18++D33B ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  19++D33B ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  20++D33B ~                                    add     hl,de
  21++D33B ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  22++D33B ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  23++D33B ~                                    pop     bc
  24++D33B ~                                    ret
  25++D33B ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  26++D33B ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  27++D33B ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  28++D33B ~                                    or      a
  29++D33B ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  30++D33B ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  31++D33B ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  32++D33B ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  33++D33B ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  34++D33B ~                                    pop     bc
  35++D33B ~                                    ret
  36++D33B ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  37++D33B ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  38++D33B ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  39++D33B ~                                    pop     bc
  40++D33B ~                                    ret
  41++D33B                                      ENDM
  42++D33B
  43++D33B
  44++D33B              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  44++D33B C5          >                        push    bc
  44++D33C 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  44++D33D 3A 22 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  44++D340 47          >                        ld      b,a
  44++D341 79          >                        ld      a,c
  44++D342 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  44++D343 FA 54 D3    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  44++D346             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  44++D346 ED 5B 74 66 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  44++D34A 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  44++D34D 19          >                        add     hl,de
  44++D34E 22 74 66    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  44++D351 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  44++D352 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D353 C9          >                        ret
  44++D354             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  44++D354 ED 5B 74 66 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  44++D358 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  44++D35B B7          >                        or      a
  44++D35C ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  44++D35E 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  44++D360 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  44++D361 22 74 66    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  44++D364 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  44++D366 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D367 C9          >                        ret
  44++D368             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  44++D368 AF          >                    xor a
  44++D369 95          >                    sub l
  44++D36A 6F          >                    ld l,a
  44++D36B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  44++D36C 94          >                    sub h
  44++D36D 67          >                    ld h,a
  44++D36E 22 74 66    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  44++D371 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  44++D372 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D373 C9          >                        ret
  45++D374
  46++D374              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  46++D374 C5          >                        push    bc
  46++D375 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  46++D376 3A 25 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  46++D379 47          >                        ld      b,a
  46++D37A 79          >                        ld      a,c
  46++D37B A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  46++D37C FA 8D D3    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  46++D37F             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  46++D37F ED 5B 74 66 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  46++D383 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  46++D386 19          >                        add     hl,de
  46++D387 22 74 66    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  46++D38A 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  46++D38B C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D38C C9          >                        ret
  46++D38D             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  46++D38D ED 5B 74 66 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  46++D391 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  46++D394 B7          >                        or      a
  46++D395 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  46++D397 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++D399 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  46++D39A 22 74 66    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  46++D39D EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  46++D39F C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D3A0 C9          >                        ret
  46++D3A1             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  46++D3A1 AF          >                    xor a
  46++D3A2 95          >                    sub l
  46++D3A3 6F          >                    ld l,a
  46++D3A4 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  46++D3A5 94          >                    sub h
  46++D3A6 67          >                    ld h,a
  46++D3A7 22 74 66    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  46++D3AA 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  46++D3AB C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D3AC C9          >                        ret
  47++D3AD
  48++D3AD              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  48++D3AD C5          >                        push    bc
  48++D3AE 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  48++D3AF 3A 28 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  48++D3B2 47          >                        ld      b,a
  48++D3B3 79          >                        ld      a,c
  48++D3B4 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  48++D3B5 FA C6 D3    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  48++D3B8             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  48++D3B8 ED 5B 74 66 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  48++D3BC 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D3BF 19          >                        add     hl,de
  48++D3C0 22 74 66    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  48++D3C3 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  48++D3C4 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D3C5 C9          >                        ret
  48++D3C6             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  48++D3C6 ED 5B 74 66 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  48++D3CA 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D3CD B7          >                        or      a
  48++D3CE ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  48++D3D0 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  48++D3D2 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  48++D3D3 22 74 66    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++D3D6 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  48++D3D8 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D3D9 C9          >                        ret
  48++D3DA             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  48++D3DA AF          >                    xor a
  48++D3DB 95          >                    sub l
  48++D3DC 6F          >                    ld l,a
  48++D3DD 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  48++D3DE 94          >                    sub h
  48++D3DF 67          >                    ld h,a
  48++D3E0 22 74 66    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  48++D3E3 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  48++D3E4 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D3E5 C9          >                        ret
  49++D3E6
  50++D3E6              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  51++D3E6 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  52++D3E9              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  53++D3E9              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  54++D3E9              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  55++D3E9
  56++D3E9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  57++D3E9              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  58++D3E9 3A 8D 66     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  59++D3EC 21 81 66                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  60++D3EF B6                                   or      (hl)
  61++D3F0 CA B0 D4                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  62++D3F3              ; If the xsgn,ysng or zsng are not 0 or $80 then we use 24 bit routines
  63++D3F3              ; else we can just continue to use 16 bit
  64++D3F3                                     ;jp      ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit
  65++D3F3
  66++D3F3 3A 22 C0     .CheckFor24Bit:         ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  67++D3F6 21 25 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKysgn
  68++D3F9 B6                                   or      (hl)
  69++D3FA 21 28 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKzsgn
  70++D3FD B6                                   or      (hl)
  71++D3FE E6 7F                                and     $7F
  72++D400 C2 3A D5                             jp      nz,ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit
  73++D403                                      ;break
  74++D403              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  75++D403 5F           .Not24BitCalcs:         ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  76++D404 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  77++D407 CD 4F 6C                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  78++D40A 32 75 66                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  79++D40D 22 73 66                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  80++D410              ; A = Flip sign
  81++D410 3A 8E 66                             ld      a,(ALP2)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  82++D413 21 22 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  83++D416 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  84++D417              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  85++D417 CD 74 D3                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  86++D41A              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  87++D41A 32 E8 D3                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  88++D41D 22 E6 D3                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  89++D420              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  90++D420 3A 81 66                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  91++D423 5F                                   ld      e,a
  92++D424 CD 4F 6C                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  93++D427 32 75 66                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  94++D42A 22 73 66                             ld      (varP),hl
  95++D42D              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
  96++D42D 3A E8 D3                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
  97++D430 5F                                   ld      e,a
  98++D431 3A 82 66                             ld      a,(BET2)
  99++D434 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
 100++D435              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
 101++D435 CD AD D3                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 102++D438 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 103++D43B 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 104++D43E              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 105++D43E 3A 81 66                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 106++D441 5F                                   ld      e,a
 107++D442 CD 4F 6C                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 108++D445 32 75 66                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 109++D448 22 73 66                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 110++D44B              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 111++D44B 3A E8 D3                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 112++D44E 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 113++D451 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 114++D452 3A 82 66                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 115++D455 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 116++D456 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 117++D457 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 118++D45A AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 119++D45B F2 6A D4                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 120++D45E 2A 74 66                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 121++D461 ED 5B E6 D3                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 122++D465 B7                                   or      a
 123++D466 19                                   add     hl,de
 124++D467 C3 84 D4                             jp      .MV44
 125++D46A 2A E6 D3     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 126++D46D ED 5B 74 66                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 127++D471 B7                                   or      a
 128++D472 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 129++D474 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 130++D476                                      NegHL
 130++D476 AF          >                    xor a
 130++D477 95          >                    sub l
 130++D478 6F          >                    ld l,a
 130++D479 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 130++D47A 94          >                    sub h
 130++D47B 67          >                    ld h,a
 131++D47C 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and Univs are sign + 23 bit xpos
 132++D47F EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 133++D481 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 134++D484              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 135++D484 22 23 C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 136++D487 3A 8D 66                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 137++D48A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 138++D48B 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 139++D48E CD 4F 6C                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 140++D491 32 75 66                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 141++D494 22 73 66                             ld      (varP),hl
 142++D497 3A 8F 66                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)
 143++D49A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 144++D49B 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 145++D49E AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 146++D49F CD 3B D3                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 147++D4A2 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 148++D4A5 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 149++D4A8 DD 01                                break
 150++D4AA CD C9 D4                             call    ApplyMyRollToOrientation
 151++D4AD CD F8 D4                             call    ApplyMyPitchToOrientation
 152++D4B0                                      ; if its not a Univ then apply to local orientation
 153++D4B0 3A 6D 67     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 154++D4B3 16 00                                ld      d,0
 155++D4B5 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 156++D4B6 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 157++D4B9 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 158++D4BC 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 159++D4BD 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 160++D4BF CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 161++D4C2 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 162++D4C5 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 163++D4C8 C9                                   ret
 164++D4C9
 165++D4C9                             DISPLAY "TODO: Looks like pitch is always being applied as positive"
 166++D4C9              ApplyMyRollToOrientation:MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 166++D4C9 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 167++D4CD 3A 8C 66                             ld      a,(ALPHA)
 167++D4D0 DD 21 35 C0    ld ix,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 167++D4D4 FD 21 37 C0    ld iy,UBnkrotmatNosevY
 167++D4D8 CD 8B 02       call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyRollToNosev:
 168++D4DB 3A 8C 66                             ld      a,(ALPHA)
 168++D4DE DD 21 29 C0    ld ix,UBnkrotmatSidevX
 168++D4E2 FD 21 2B C0    ld iy,UBnkrotmatSidevY
 168++D4E6 CD 8B 02       call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyRollToSidev:
 169++D4E9 3A 8C 66                             ld      a,(ALPHA)
 169++D4EC DD 21 2F C0    ld ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
 169++D4F0 FD 21 31 C0    ld iy,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
 169++D4F4 CD 8B 02       call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyRollToRoofv:
 170++D4F7 C9                                   ret
 171++D4F8
 172++D4F8              ApplyMyPitchToOrientation:
 173++D4F8 3A 7F 66                             ld      a,(BETA)
 173++D4FB DD 21 39 C0    ld ix,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
 173++D4FF FD 21 37 C0    ld iy,UBnkrotmatNosevY
 173++D503 CD 8B 02       call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyPitchToNosev:
 174++D506 3A 7F 66                             ld      a,(BETA)
 174++D509 DD 21 2D C0    ld ix,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 174++D50D FD 21 2B C0    ld iy,UBnkrotmatSidevY
 174++D511 CD 8B 02       call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyPitchToSidev:
 175++D514 3A 7F 66                             ld      a,(BETA)
 175++D517 DD 21 33 C0    ld ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
 175++D51B FD 21 31 C0    ld iy,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
 175++D51F CD 8B 02       call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:
 176++D522 C9                                   ret
 177++D523              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 178++D523              ; 24 bit version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 179++D523              ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
 180++D523              ; Minsky Roll       Minsky Pitch
 181++D523              ;  y -= alpha * x    y -= beta * z
 182++D523              ;  x += alpha * y    z += beta * y
 183++D523              ; or once combined
 184++D523              ;   1. K2 = y - alpha * x
 185++D523              ;   2. z = z + beta * K2
 186++D523              ;   3. y = K2 - beta * z
 187++D523              ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 188++D523              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 189++D523              ; Based on non optimised version of Planet pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 190++D523              ; Now at least rolls the correct direction
 191++D523 00 00 00 00  UnivAlphaMulX               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 192++D527 00 00 00 00  UnivAlphaMulY               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 193++D52B 00 00 00 00  UnivAlphaMulZ               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 194++D52F 00 00 00 00  UnivBetaMulZ                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 195++D533 00 00 00 00  UnivBetaMulY                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 196++D537 00 00 00     UnivK2                      DS 3
 197++D53A
 198++D53A 3A 8C 66     ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit: 	 ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
 199++D53D 21 7F 66                                  ld     hl,BETA
 200++D540 B6                                        or     (hl)
 201++D541 C4 65 D5                                  call   nz, Univ_Roll_And_Pitch
 202++D544              ;.CheckForRoll:              and		a
 203++D544              ;							call	nz,Univ_Roll
 204++D544              ;.CheckForPitch:				ld		a,(BETA)
 205++D544              ;							and		a
 206++D544              ;							call	nz,Univ_Pitch
 207++D544 3A 6D 67     .ApplySpeed:            	ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
 208++D547              							ReturnIfAIsZero
 208++D547 A7          >                        and     a
 208++D548 C8          >                        ret     z
 209++D549 0E 00        							ld      c,0                         ;
 210++D54B 67           							ld      h,a                         ;
 211++D54C 06 80        							ld      b,$80                       ;
 212++D54E ED 5B 27 C0  							ld      de,(UBnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
 213++D552 3A 26 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
 214++D555 6F           							ld      l,a                         ; .
 215++D556 CD 14 01     							call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
 216++D559 ED 53 27 C0  							ld      (UBnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
 217++D55D 7D           							ld      a,l
 218++D55E 32 26 C0     							ld      (UBnKzlo),a                ;
 219++D561 C9           							ret
 220++D562              ; Performs minsky rotation
 221++D562              ; Joystick left          Joystick right
 222++D562              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
 223++D562              ; x :=  x      + y / 64  x :=  x -  y / 64  so rather than /64  is z * alpha / 256
 224++D562              ; y :=  y      - x /64   y :=  y +  x / 64
 225++D562              ;
 226++D562              ; Joystick down          Joystick up
 227++D562              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
 228++D562              ; y :=  y      + z / 64  y :=  y - z / 64
 229++D562              ; z :=  z      - y / 64  z :=  z + y / 64
 230++D562              ;
 231++D562              ; get z, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
 232++D562              ; get x, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
 233++D562              ; if alpha +ve subtract x = x - z adj, z =z + x adj , else x += z adj z -= z adj
 234++D562              ; so we can assume 24 bit maths and just do 16 bit multiply of say HL = nosev x [sgn][hi] and de = [0][alpha] by calling AHLequHLmulE
 235++D562              ; for roll
 236++D562              ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 237++D562              ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 238++D562              ; and for pitch
 239++D562              ; nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
 240++D562              ; nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
 241++D562              ;  1. K2 = y - alpha * x
 242++D562              ;   2. z = z + beta * K2
 243++D562              ;   3. y = K2 - beta * z
 244++D562              ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 245++D562              ;
 246++D562              ;   1a. K [3 2 1 0] = -alpha * (x sign hi lo)
 247++D562              ;   1b. K [3 2 1]   = y sign hi lo + K [321] (in effect y minus (alpha * x / 256)
 248++D562              ;   1c. K2 [3 2 1]  = k [3 2 1 ]
 249++D562              ;   2a. K[3 2 1 0]  = k2 [3 2 1] * beta
 250++D562              ;   2b. z sign hi lo += K[3 2 1] ( in effect z += (beta * K2)/256
 251++D562              ;   3a. K [3 2 1 0] = z sign hi lo * -beta
 252++D562              ;   3b. y sign hi lo = K2 [3 2 1] - K [3 2 1] ( in effect K2 - (beta * z) /256
 253++D562              ;
 254++D562              ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 255++D562
 256++D562
 257++D562
 258++D562              ;-- Q = - ALPHA
 259++D562              ;-- A P[1 0] = xsign xhi xlo
 260++D562              ;-- call K[3 2 1 0] = A P[1 0] * Q which means  K(3 2 1) = (A P+1 P) * Q / 256 = x * -alpha / 256 = - alpha * x / 256
 261++D562              ;-- call K[3 2 1] = ysign hi lo + K[3 2 1] (= y - alpha * x / 256)
 262++D562              ;-- K2 [3 2 1 ] = K [ 3 2 1 ]
 263++D562              ;-- A P [1 0]   = K [3 2 1]
 264++D562              ;-- Q = BETA
 265++D562              ;-- K[3 2 1 0] = A P[1 0] * Q
 266++D562              ;-- K3[3 2 1] = z sign hi lo + K[3 2 1]
 267++D562              ;-- A P [1 0] = -K [3 2 1]
 268++D562              ;-- z sign hi lo = K[3 2 1]
 269++D562              ;-- K[3 2 1 0] = A P[1 0] * Q
 270++D562              ;-- T = K[3] sign bit
 271++D562              ;-- A = K[3] sign bit xor K2[3]
 272++D562              ;-- if positive A yhi lo - = K [3 2 1 0] + K2[3 2 1 0] so A yhi ylo = K + K2 /256 as we abandon low byte
 273++D562              ;-- if negative A yhi lo = (K - k2 )/256
 274++D562              ;-- A = A xor T
 275++D562              ;-- y sign = A
 276++D562              ;-- Q = alpha
 277++D562              ;-- A P(1 0) = y sign hi lo
 278++D562              ;-- K[3 2 1 0 ] A P[1 0] * Q
 279++D562              ;-- x sign hi lo = K[3 2 1] = xsign hi lo * K[3 2 1]
 280++D562
 281++D562 00 00 00     K2      DS  3
 282++D565
 283++D565 3A 8C 66     Univ_Roll_And_Pitch:	    ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 284++D568              ;** 1. K2 = y - alpha * x **************************************
 285++D568              ;-- DEL = alpha * (x sign hi lo) /256
 286++D568 57           							ld      d,a                         ; d = alpha
 287++D569 3A 20 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                 ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 288++D56C 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 289++D56D 2A 21 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKxhi)                ; hl = UBnKchi sgn
 290++D570 CD 1E 6D     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * alpha / 256
 291++D573              ;-- DEL = K2 = y - alpha * x
 292++D573 42 4B                                    ld      bc,de                       ; transfer to BCH for now
 293++D575 65                                       ld      h,l
 294++D576 ED 5B 24 C0                              ld      de,(UBnKyhi)
 295++D57A 3A 23 C0                                 ld      a,(UBnKylo)
 296++D57D 6F                                       ld      l,a
 297++D57E CD 10 01                                 call    SubBCHfromDELsigned
 298++D581 ED 53 63 D5                              ld      (K2+1),de
 299++D585 7D                                       ld      a,l
 300++D586 32 62 D5                                 ld      (K2),a
 301++D589              ;** 2. z = z + beta * K2 ***************************************
 302++D589              ;-- HLE = DEL ..................................................
 303++D589 EB                                       ex      de,hl                       ; will set hl to de and e to l in one go
 304++D58A              ;-- DELC = beta * HLE, i.e. beta * K2
 305++D58A 3A 7F 66                                 ld      a,(BETA)
 306++D58D 57                                       ld      d,a
 307++D58E CD 1E 6D                                 call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = beta * K2
 308++D591              ;-- DEL = z + DEL, i.e. z + Beta * K2 /256
 309++D591 ED 4B 27 C0                              ld      bc,(UBnKzhi)                ; BCH = z
 310++D595 3A 26 C0                                 ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
 311++D598 67                                       ld      h,a                         ; .
 312++D599 CD 14 01                                 call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL =z + (beta * K2)/256
 313++D59C ED 53 27 C0                              ld      (UBnKzhi),de                ; and save to Z
 314++D5A0 7D                                       ld      a,l                         ; .
 315++D5A1 32 26 C0                                 ld      (UBnKzlo),a                 ; .
 316++D5A4              ;** 3. y = K2 - beta * z ***************************************
 317++D5A4              ;-- DEL = beta * z / 256
 318++D5A4 3A 7F 66                                 ld      a,(BETA)                    ; get pitch value
 319++D5A7 57           							ld      d,a                         ; d = pitch
 320++D5A8 3A 26 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; HLE = z sgn, hi, lo
 321++D5AB 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 322++D5AC 2A 27 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)                ; hl = UBnKchi sgn
 323++D5AF CD 1E 6D     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = z * beta, so DEL = z * beta / 256
 324++D5B2              ;-- BCH = DEL ..................................................
 325++D5B2 42 4B                                    ld      bc,de                       ; transfer to BCH for now
 326++D5B4 65                                       ld      h,l
 327++D5B5              ;-- y = DEL = K2 - beta * z = DEL - BCH
 328++D5B5 ED 5B 63 D5                              ld      de,(K2+1)                   ; del = K2
 329++D5B9 3A 62 D5                                 ld      a,(K2)                      ; .
 330++D5BC 6F                                       ld      l,a                         ; .
 331++D5BD CD 10 01                                 call    SubBCHfromDELsigned         ; .
 332++D5C0 ED 53 24 C0                              ld      (UBnKyhi),de                ; and save to y
 333++D5C4 7D                                       ld      a,l                         ; .
 334++D5C5 32 23 C0                                 ld      (UBnKylo),a                 ; .
 335++D5C8              ;** 4. x = x + alpha * y ***************************************
 336++D5C8              ;-- DEL = alpha * y
 337++D5C8 3A 8C 66                                 ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 338++D5CB              ;-- DEL = alpha * (y sign hi lo) /256
 339++D5CB 57           							ld      d,a                         ; d = alpha
 340++D5CC 3A 23 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKylo)                 ; HLE = y sgn, hi, lo
 341++D5CF 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 342++D5D0 2A 24 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)                ; hl = UBnKyhi sgn
 343++D5D3 CD 1E 6D     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = y * alpha, so DEL = Y * alpha / 256
 344++D5D6              ;-- DEL = x + alpha * y
 345++D5D6 42 4B                                    ld      bc,de                       ; transfer to BCH for now
 346++D5D8 65                                       ld      h,l                         ; .
 347++D5D9 ED 5B 21 C0                              ld      de,(UBnKxhi)                ; del = x
 348++D5DD 3A 20 C0                                 ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                 ; .
 349++D5E0 6F                                       ld      l,a                         ; .
 350++D5E1 CD 14 01                                 call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; del = del + bch = x + alpha * y
 351++D5E4 ED 53 21 C0                              ld      (UBnKxhi),de                ; and save to x
 352++D5E8 7D                                       ld      a,l                         ; .
 353++D5E9 32 20 C0                                 ld      (UBnKxlo),a                 ; .
 354++D5EC CD C9 D4     .ApplyRollToRight:          call    ApplyMyRollToOrientation
 355++D5EF CD F8 D4     .ApplyPitchToClimb:         call    ApplyMyPitchToOrientation
 356++D5F2 CD D1 7A                                 call    TIDY ; doesn't work
 357++D5F5 C9           							ret

   1++D5F6
   2++D5F6              ; A = value for rotation
   3++D5F6              ; HL = address of value for rotation

   5++D5F6              SplitAndDampenZ:        MACRO
   6++D5F6 ~                                    ld      b,a
   7++D5F6 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
   8++D5F6 ~                                    jp      z,.ProcessRoll
   9++D5F6 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  10++D5F6 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  11++D5F6 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  12++D5F6 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  13++D5F6 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  14++D5F6 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  15++D5F6 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  16++D5F6 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  17++D5F6 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  18++D5F6 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  19++D5F6                                      ENDM
  20++D5F6
  21++D5F6              SplitAndDampenX:        MACRO
  22++D5F6 ~                                    ld      b,a
  23++D5F6 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  24++D5F6 ~                                    and     a                       ; .
  25++D5F6 ~                                    ret     z                       ; .
  26++D5F6 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  27++D5F6 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  28++D5F6 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  29++D5F6 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  30++D5F6 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  31++D5F6 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  32++D5F6 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  33++D5F6 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  34++D5F6 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  35++D5F6 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  36++D5F6                                      ENDM

  76++D67E 21 33 C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  77++D681 22 58 66                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  78++D684 21 2D C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  79++D687 22 5A 66                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  80++D68A CD 8E D6                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  81++D68D C9                                   ret
  82++D68E
  83++D68E
  84++D68E
  85++D68E              ; Roate around axis
  86++D68E              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
  87++D68E              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
  88++D68E              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
  89++D68E              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
  90++D68E              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
  91++D68E              ; var RAT2 gives direction
  92++D68E              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
  93++D68E              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
  94++D68E              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
  95++D68E 2A 58 66     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
  96++D691 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  97++D692 23                                   inc     hl
  98++D693 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
  99++D694 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 100++D695 7C                                   ld      a,h
 101++D696 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 102++D698 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 103++D69A 7C                                   ld      a,h
 104++D69B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 105++D69D CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 106++D69F 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 107++D6A0 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 108++D6A2 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 109++D6A3 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 110++D6A4 CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15      ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 111++D6A7              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 112++D6A7 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 113++D6A8 7D                                   ld      a,l
 114++D6A9 32 74 67                             ld      (varR),a
 115++D6AC 7C                                   ld      a,h
 116++D6AD 32 75 67                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 117++D6B0              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 118++D6B0 2A 5A 66                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 119++D6B3 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 120++D6B4 23                                   inc     hl
 121++D6B5 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 122++D6B6 7A                                   ld      a,d
 123++D6B7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 124++D6B9 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 125++D6BB 7A                                   ld      a,d
 126++D6BC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 127++D6BE 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 128++D6BF                                      ShiftDERight1
 128++D6BF CB 3A       >			   srl d
 128++D6C1 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 129++D6C3                                      ShiftDERight1
 129++D6C3 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 129++D6C5 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 130++D6C7                                      ShiftDERight1
 130++D6C7 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 130++D6C9 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 131++D6CB                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 131++D6CB CB 3A       >			   srl d
 131++D6CD CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 132++D6CF 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 133++D6D2 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 134++D6D4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 135++D6D6 B2                                   or      d
 136++D6D7 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 137++D6D8              ;;; ld      a,e
 138++D6D8              ;;;     or      iyh
 139++D6D8              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 140++D6D8              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 141++D6D8 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 142++D6D9                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 143++D6D9              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 144++D6D9 CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4 ; do add using hl and de
 145++D6DC E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 146++D6DD              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 147++D6DD              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 148++D6DD 2A 5A 66                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 149++D6E0 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 150++D6E1 23                                   inc     hl
 151++D6E2 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 152++D6E3 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 153++D6E4 7C                                   ld      a,h
 154++D6E5 E6 80                                and     $80
 155++D6E7 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 156++D6E9 7C                                   ld      a,h
 157++D6EA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 158++D6EC CB 3F                                srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 159++D6EE 5F                                   ld      e,a
 160++D6EF FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 161++D6F1 57                                   ld      d,a
 162++D6F2 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 163++D6F3 CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15
 164++D6F6              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 165++D6F6 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 166++D6F7 7D                                   ld      a,l
 167++D6F8 32 73 66                             ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 168++D6FB 7C                                   ld      a,h
 169++D6FC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 170++D6FE 32 8F 67                             ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 171++D701              ;-- Set up TQ
 172++D701 2A 58 66                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 173++D704              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 174++D704 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 175++D705 23                                   inc     hl
 176++D706 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 177++D707 7A                                   ld      a,d
 178++D708 E6 80                                and     $80
 179++D70A FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 180++D70C 7A                                   ld      a,d
 181++D70D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 182++D70F 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 183++D710                                      ShiftDERight1
 183++D710 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 183++D712 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 184++D714                                      ShiftDERight1
 184++D714 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 184++D716 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 185++D718                                      ShiftDERight1
 185++D718 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 185++D71A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 186++D71C                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 186++D71C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 186++D71E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 187++D720 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)
 188++D723 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 189++D725 E6 80                                and     $80
 190++D727 B2                                   or      d
 191++D728 57                                   ld      d,a
 192++D729              ;;; ld      a,e
 193++D729              ;;;     or      iyh
 194++D729              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 195++D729 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 196++D72A              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 197++D72A CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15 ; do add using hl and de
 198++D72D              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 199++D72D EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 200++D72E 2A 5A 66                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 201++D731 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 202++D732 23                                   inc     hl
 203++D733 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 204++D734              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 205++D734 D1                                   pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 206++D735 2A 58 66                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 207++D738 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 208++D739 23                                   inc     hl
 209++D73A 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 210++D73B C9                                   ret
 211++D73C
 212++D73C
# file closed: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
 849+ D73C                          INCLUDE "../../Universe/Ships/ApplyShipSpeed.asm"

   1++D73C

   8++D73C              ;                        ld      (vertex),hl

  10++D73C              ;                        ENDM

  12++D73C

  16++D741 C8                                   ret     z

  18++D744 CB 27                                sla     a

  20++D74D             >                        ClearSignBitA
  20++D74D E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  20++D74F 57          >                        ld      d,a

  20++D752 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  20++D753             >                        SignBitOnlyA

  20++D755 47          >                        ld      b,a;ld      c,a
  20++D756 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  20++D757 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0

  21++D765 32 20 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKxlo),a
  21++D768 ED 53 21 C0 >                        ld      (UBnKxlo+1),de
  22++D76C              .ApplyToY:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatNosevY

   6++D7B8              LL155:;
   7++D7B8              ClearLine:                                  ; CLEAR LINEstr visited by EE31 when XX3 heap ready to draw/erase lines in XX19 heap.

 883+ D89A FD 66 03                             ld      h,(iy+3)
 884+ D89D C5 FD E5                             push    bc,,iy
 885+ D8A0 CD B1 D8                             call    PlotAtDEHL
 886+ D8A3 FD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,iy
 887+ D8A6 FD 23                                inc     iy
 888+ D8A8 FD 23                                inc     iy
 889+ D8AA FD 23                                inc     iy
 890+ D8AC FD 23                                inc     iy
 891+ D8AE 10 E1                                djnz    .PlotLoop
 892+ D8B0 C9                                   ret
 893+ D8B1
 894+ D8B1 7A           PlotAtDEHL:             ld      a,d
 895+ D8B2 A7                                   and     a
 896+ D8B3 C0                                   ret     nz
 897+ D8B4 7C                                   ld      a,h
 898+ D8B5 A7                                   and     a
 899+ D8B6 C0                                   ret     nz
 900+ D8B7 7D                                   ld      a,l
 901+ D8B8 E6 80                                and     $80
 902+ D8BA C0                                   ret     nz
 903+ D8BB                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 903+ D8BB ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 904+ D8BF 45                                   ld      b,l
 905+ D8C0 4B                                   ld      c,e
 906+ D8C1 3E 88                                ld      a,$88
 907+ D8C3 CD 8E E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 908+ D8C6 C9                                   ret
 909+ D8C7
 910+ D8C7
 911+ D8C7              ; .....................................................
 912+ D8C7              ; Process Nodes does the following:
 913+ D8C7              ; for each node:
 914+ D8C7              ;     see if node >
 915+ D8C7 00           PNXX20DIV6          DB      0
 916+ D8C8 00 00        PNVERTEXPTR         DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
 917+ D8CA 00 00        PNNODEPRT           DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
 918+ D8CC 00           PNLASTNORM          DB      0
 919+ D8CD              ProcessNodes:           ZeroA
 919+ D8CD AF          >                        xor a
 920+ D8CE 32 EA C3                             ld      (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
 921+ D8D1 CD 36 CA                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat ; CopyRotToTransMacro                      ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
 922+ D8D4 CD 02 63                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
 923+ D8D7 CD EE CC                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
 924+ D8DA CD BB CB                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
 925+ D8DD 21 11 C4                             ld      hl,UBnkHullVerticies
 926+ D8E0 3A FF C3                             ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#9 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
 927+ D8E3 4F           GetActualVertexCount:   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
 928+ D8E4 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
 929+ D8E5 16 06                                ld      d,6
 930+ D8E7 CD 34 71                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 931+ D8EA 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
 932+ D8EB FD 21 F0 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
 933+ D8EF              LL48:
 934+ D8EF C5           PointLoop:              push    bc                                  ; save counters
 935+ D8F0 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save verticies list pointer
 936+ D8F1 FD E5                                push    iy                                  ; save Screen plot array pointer
 937+ D8F3 78                                   ld      a,b
 938+ D8F4                                      ;break
 939+ D8F4 CD 65 D2                             call    CopyNodeToXX15                      ; copy verices at hl to xx15
 940+ D8F7 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 941+ D8FA CD 64 62                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
 942+ D8FD CD 5F CA                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
 943+ D900 CD DC CA                             call    ScaleNodeTo8Bit                     ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
 944+ D903 FD E1                                pop     iy                                  ; get back screen plot array pointer
 945+ D905 CD E4 D2                             call    ProjectNodeToEye                     ; set up screen plot list entry
 946+ D908                 ; ld      hl,UbnkLineArrayLen
 947+ D908                ;  inc     (hl)                                ; another node done
 948+ D908 FD E5        ReadyForNextPoint:      push    iy                                  ; copy screen plot pointer to hl
 949+ D90A E1                                   pop     hl
 950+ D90B 3E 04                                ld      a,4
 951+ D90D ED 31                                add     hl,a
 952+ D90F E5                                   push    hl                                  ; write it back at iy + 4
 953+ D910 FD E1                                pop     iy                                  ; and put it in iy again
 954+ D912 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; get hl back as vertex list
 955+ D913 3E 06                                ld      a,6
 956+ D915 ED 31                                add     hl,a                                ; and move to next vertex
 957+ D917 C1                                   pop     bc                                  ; get counter back
 958+ D918 10 D5                                djnz    PointLoop
 959+ D91A              ; ......................................................
 960+ D91A                                      ClearCarryFlag
 960+ D91A B7          >                        or a
 961+ D91B C9                                   ret
 962+ D91C              ; ...........................................................
 963+ D91C CD E9 CE     ProcessShip:            call    CheckVisible                ; checks for z -ve and outside view frustrum, sets up flags for next bit
 964+ D91F              ;............................................................
 965+ D91F              .DetermineDrawType:     ReturnOnBitClear    a, ShipIsVisibleBitNbr          ; if its not visible exit early
 965+ D91F CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
 965+ D921 C8          >                        ret		z
 966+ D922              ;............................................................
 967+ D922 CD CD D8     .CarryOnWithDraw:       call    ProcessNodes                ; process notes is the poor performer or check distnace is not culling
 968+ D925                                     ; break
 969+ D925 3E E3                                ld      a,$E3
 970+ D927 32 8D E2                             ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
 971+ D92A CD 30 CF                             call    CullV2
 972+ D92D CD 44 D9                             call    PrepLines                       ; With late clipping this just moves the data to the line array which is now x2 size
 973+ D930 CD E4 D7                             call    DrawLinesLateClipping
 974+ D933 C9                                   ret

 990+ D943              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 991+ D943              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
 992+ D943               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1

 995+ D944              PrepLines:
 996+ D944              InitialiseLineRead:
 997+ D944                      ;break
 998+ D944                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
 998+ D944 AF          >                        xor      a
 998+ D945 32 EA C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
 999+ D948 32 EB C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
1000+ D94B 32 43 D9             ld          (PLEDGECTR),a
1001+ D94E 3A 00 C4             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
1002+ D951 DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
1003+ D953 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
1004+ D956 21 30 C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
1005+ D959 22 76 67             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16

1008+ D965 CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
1008+ D967 CA 6F D9    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
